original: h'um h'um ho: mig gnyis la rdo rje nyi ma'o; ;phat ham lus thams cad kyi go cha ste /🔽rta mchog go /
analyzed: h'um h'um ho: mig gnyis la rdo rje nyi ma'o; ;phat ham lus thams cad kyi go cha ste / rta mchog go /
translated: PHAT HAM: armor of the whole body, Hayagriva.

original: aom bam lte ba la rdo rje phag mo'o //
analyzed: aom bam lte ba la rdo rje phag mo'o //
translated: OM BAM: Vajravarahi in the navel.

original: ham yom snying ga la ya mi ni'o //🔽hr'im yom kha la rmongs byed ma'o //🔽hrem hrem mgo la bskyod byed ma'o //
analyzed: ham yom snying ga la ya mi ni'o // hr'im yom kha la rmongs byed ma'o // hrem hrem mgo la bskyod byed ma'o //
translated: HAM YOM: Yamini in the heart.🔽HRIH YOM: Moharati in the mouth.🔽HREM HREM: Camunda on the head.

original: h'um h'um spyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o //🔽phat phat tsandi ka ste /
analyzed: h'um h'um spyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o // phat phat tsandi ka ste /
translated: HUM HUM: Tarani on the crown of the head.

original: yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o //🔽mdzub mo 'dud byas gung mo nges par sbyar //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o // mdzub mo 'dud byas gung mo nges par sbyar //
translated: PHAT PHAT: Chandika, the weapon of all the limbs.🔽The index fingers are bent, the middle fingers are extended,

original: mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar //
analyzed: mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar //
translated: the thumbs are firmly joined.

original: de ni dpral ba'i dbus su rang bzhag nas //
analyzed: de ni dpral ba'i dbus su rang bzhag nas //
translated: Having placed that in the middle of the forehead,

original: bskor cing bskor bar kun tu sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: bskor cing bskor bar kun tu sbyar bar bya //
translated: one should rotate and join it.

original: rkang pa phyed mnan steng du blta //
analyzed: rkang pa phyed mnan steng du blta //
translated: The foot is half-raised, looking upward,

original: gyen du phem gyi sgra sgrog cing //🔽phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
analyzed: gyen du phem gyi sgra sgrog cing // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
translated: emitting the sound of PHAT.🔽The heroes and yoginis dwelling in the ten directions

original: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bkug /
analyzed: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bkug /
translated: of the world are summoned.

original: dza: h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho:/
translated: JAḤ HŪṃ BAṂ HOḤ

original: sbyor bas bkug nas gzhug pa dang // bcings nas dbang du bya ba yin //🔽dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis //
analyzed: sbyor bas bkug nas gzhug pa dang // bcings nas dbang du bya ba yin // dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis //
translated: and having bound, one should bring under control.

original: mkha' dkyil yongs su gang mthong nas //🔽ye shes chu yi bdud rtsi yis //
analyzed: mkha' dkyil yongs su gang mthong nas // ye shes chu yi bdud rtsi yis //
translated: Seeing the sky filled with heroes and yoginis,

original: gang ba'i bum pa blangs nas ni //
analyzed: gang ba'i bum pa blangs nas ni //
translated: one should take up the vase🔽filled with the nectar of the water of gnosis

original: lag pas de la dbang bskur bya //
analyzed: lag pas de la dbang bskur bya //
translated: and confer the empowerment with the hand.🔽One should offer the empowerment

original: glu dang gar gyi mchod pa yis //🔽dbang bskur dag ni dbul bar bya //
analyzed: glu dang gar gyi mchod pa yis // dbang bskur dag ni dbul bar bya //
translated: with the worship of song and dance.

original: de la sngags ni /
analyzed: de la sngags ni /
translated: The mantra is:

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um h'um/
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um h'um/
translated: Om, all tathagatas, I request the conferral of the empowerment, be victorious!

original: @200a *// glu 'di blangs pas bskul ba'am /
analyzed: @200a *// glu 'di blangs pas bskul ba'am /
translated: Having sung this song, one should request,🔽or else, the great dakinis, being pleased and extremely pleased,

original: yang na mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rnams thugs dgyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes par gyur te /🔽dbang bskur rol mo'i bde chen po //
analyzed: yang na mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rnams thugs dgyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes par gyur te / dbang bskur rol mo'i bde chen po //
translated: will confer the empowerment.🔽The great bliss of the empowerment,

original: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po //
translated: the great bliss of the dakini net,

original: dgyes chen gsol ba'i bde chen po //
analyzed: dgyes chen gsol ba'i bde chen po //
translated: the great bliss of the request for great joy,

original: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po //
translated: the great bliss of the dakini net,

original: gsal mdzad bde ba chen po ste //
analyzed: gsal mdzad bde ba chen po ste //
translated: the great bliss of the illuminator,

original: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po //
translated: The great bliss of the dakini net.

original: aa la la ho //
analyzed: aa la la ho //
translated: A la la ho!

original: mchog tu gyur pa bde chen po //
analyzed: mchog tu gyur pa bde chen po //
translated: The supreme great bliss,

original: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po //
translated: The great bliss of the dakini net.

original: aa la la ho //
analyzed: aa la la ho //
translated: A la la ho!

original: bde chen ye shes dgyes nas ni //
analyzed: bde chen ye shes dgyes nas ni //
translated: Delighting in the wisdom of great bliss,

original: dam tshig dam tshig can la bzhugs //
analyzed: dam tshig dam tshig can la bzhugs //

original: ye shes ro gcig bsgoms nas ni //
analyzed: ye shes ro gcig bsgoms nas ni //

original: ro gcig 'khor lo'ang de bzhin bsgom //
analyzed: ro gcig 'khor lo'ang de bzhin bsgom //

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can //

original: ye shes lnga dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: ye shes lnga dang yang dag ldan //

original: rtsa ba'i sngags sogs dpa' bo gang //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags sogs dpa' bo gang //

original: tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs brtag /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs brtag /

original: rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gang yin //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gang yin //
translated: Whatever is the mantra of Vajravarahi,🔽Ornamenting the neck with the neck,

original: mgul nas mgul du rnam par brgyan; ;lha mo'i snying po'i sngags kyis ni //
analyzed: mgul nas mgul du rnam par brgyan; ;lha mo'i snying po'i sngags kyis ni //

original: phreng ba brgya phyed kyis brgyan cing //
analyzed: phreng ba brgya phyed kyis brgyan cing //
translated: Adorned with the half-hundred garland,

original: gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa yis //
analyzed: gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa yis //

original: nor bu rna cha legs mdzes shing //
analyzed: nor bu rna cha legs mdzes shing //

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma //

original: pags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /
analyzed: pags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /

original: rnal 'byor ma drug gsang sngags kyis //🔽ska rags rgyad du byas pa yin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma drug gsang sngags kyis // ska rags rgyad du byas pa yin //
translated: the sixfold girdle.

original: go cha drug po dag gis ni //
analyzed: go cha drug po dag gis ni //
translated: The six armors

original: phyag @200b rgya lus ni rab tu mdzes //
analyzed: phyag @200b rgya lus ni rab tu mdzes //

original: 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: 'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma //

original: sngags kyi btung ba'i thod pa yin //🔽rnam snang mdzad ma sngags gang gis //
analyzed: sngags kyi btung ba'i thod pa yin // rnam snang mdzad ma sngags gang gis //

analyzed: thod pas spyi gtsug rgyan du byas //

original: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis //
analyzed: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis //

original: lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag /
analyzed: lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag /

original: de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te //
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te //
translated: Having thus contemplated the self,

original: tsham dam sngags kyis legs par bsrung //
analyzed: tsham dam sngags kyis legs par bsrung //

original: tshangs par spyod pa brtags gyur nas //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa brtags gyur nas //

original: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod //
analyzed: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod //

original: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te //
analyzed: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te //

original: de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid bsam //🔽spro dang bsdu ba'i ye shes bsgom //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid bsam // spro dang bsdu ba'i ye shes bsgom //

original: snyoms 'jug ye shes bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: snyoms 'jug ye shes bzlas pa bya //

original: rnal 'byor chen po sgrub chen po //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po sgrub chen po //

original: rdo rje khro bo'i thig le las //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo'i thig le las //

original: khams gsum du ni spro bar bya //
analyzed: khams gsum du ni spro bar bya //

original: rdo rje'i sna yi rtse mo 'bar //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sna yi rtse mo 'bar //

original: spro bya nam mkhar thig le las //
analyzed: spro bya nam mkhar thig le las //

original: rdo rje phra mo mthong gyur pa //
analyzed: rdo rje phra mo mthong gyur pa //

original: ba spu'i khung bu'i bar dag nas //
analyzed: ba spu'i khung bu'i bar dag nas //

original: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu bar //🔽khro bo sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro //
analyzed: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu bar // khro bo sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro //

original: rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor ni; ;sum cu rtsa bdun rim pa yin //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor ni; ;sum cu rtsa bdun rim pa yin //
translated: is the thirty-seven stages.

original: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /

original: mkha' 'gro ma'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'o //
translated: is Ḍākinī.

original: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /

original: l'a ma'o // chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: l'a ma'o // chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /

original: dum skyes ma'o //
analyzed: dum skyes ma'o //
translated: is Khaṇḍarohā.

original: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /

original: gzugs can ma'o //
analyzed: gzugs can ma'o //

original: 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni /
analyzed: 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni /
translated: The foot of supernatural power of aspiration

original: rab gtum ma'o //
analyzed: rab gtum ma'o //
translated: is Pracaṇḍā.

original: brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni /

original: @201a *// mi'u thang ma'o //
analyzed: @201a *// mi'u thang ma'o //
translated: is Caṇḍālī.

original: dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni /
analyzed: dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni /
translated: The foot of supernatural power of analysis🔽is Ūrdhvacakrā.

original: 'od ldan ma'o //🔽sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni /
analyzed: 'od ldan ma'o // sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni /
translated: The power of light is Marichi.

original: sna chen ma'o //🔽dad pa'i dbang po ni /🔽dpa' ba'i blo gros can ma'o //
analyzed: sna chen ma'o // dad pa'i dbang po ni / dpa' ba'i blo gros can ma'o //
translated: The power of mind is Mahaprajna.🔽The power of faith is Varahi.

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni / mi'u thung ma'o // dran pa'i dbang po ni /

analyzed: langka'i dbang phyug ma'o // ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni /

original: shing grib ma'o //🔽shes rab kyi dbang po ni /
analyzed: shing grib ma'o // shes rab kyi dbang po ni /

original: sa srung ma'o //🔽dad pa'i stobs ni /
analyzed: sa srung ma'o // dad pa'i stobs ni /

original: 'jigs byed chen mo'o //🔽brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni /
analyzed: 'jigs byed chen mo'o // brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni /

original: rlung gi shugs can ma'o //
analyzed: rlung gi shugs can ma'o //

original: dran pa'i stobs ni /🔽chang 'thung ma'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i stobs ni / chang 'thung ma'o //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni / sngo bsangs lha mo'o // shes rab kyi stobs ni /

original: shin tu bzang mo'o //
analyzed: shin tu bzang mo'o //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni / rta rna ma'o // brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni /

original: bya gdong ma'o //
analyzed: bya gdong ma'o //

analyzed: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni /

analyzed: 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o //

analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni /

analyzed: dum skyes ma'o //

analyzed: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni /

analyzed: chang tshong ma'o //

analyzed: shin tu dpa' mo'o //

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba ni /

original: stobs chen ma'o //
analyzed: stobs chen ma'o //
translated: is Mahābalā.🔽Right thought

analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtog pa @201b ni; 'khor los bsgyur ma'o //

analyzed: yang dag pa'i ngag ni /

original: dpa' bo chen mo'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo chen mo'o //

analyzed: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni /

original: bya rog gdong can ma'o //
analyzed: bya rog gdong can ma'o //

analyzed: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni /

analyzed: 'ug pa'i gdong can ma'o; ;yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni /

analyzed: khyi'i gdong can ma'o //

analyzed: yang dag pa'i dran pa ni /

original: phag gi gdong can ma'o //
analyzed: phag gi gdong can ma'o //
translated: The one with a pig's face is Māmakī.

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o //

analyzed: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni /

analyzed: gshin rje sreg ma'o //

analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma'o //

analyzed: dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'i sgom pa'o //

analyzed: de nas dam tshig 'khor lo dag /

analyzed: mnyam par bzhag ste bzla bar bya /

original: ha ha / h'um h'um/
analyzed: ha ha / h'um h'um/

original: hi hi / phat/
analyzed: hi hi / phat/
translated: hi hi, phaṭ.

original: h'um h'um/ aa aa /
analyzed: h'um h'um/ aa aa /
translated: Hūṃ hūṃ, a ā,

analyzed: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru ki h'um h'um phat/

analyzed: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

analyzed: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //

original: aom badzra pee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom badzra pee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra-varṇa-nīsye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom sarba buddha da ki n'i ye badzra barna n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom sarba buddha da ki n'i ye badzra barna n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ sarva-buddha-ḍākinīsye vajra-varṇa-nīsye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
translated: The essence and the close essence of the goddess.

original: aom d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom l'a me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom l'a me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ ḍākinīsye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ lāmāye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ khaṇḍarohiṇīye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom r'u pi n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom r'u pi n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ rūpiṇīsye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom khanda ka p'a li ni kar ka ra hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom khanda ka p'a li ni kar ka ra hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ khaṇḍakapālinikara kara huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom pra tsande hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom pra tsande hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ pracaṇḍe huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ma h'a kam @202a *//
analyzed: aom ma h'a kam @202a *//
translated: Oṃ mahākaṃ

original: ka la ku ru ku ru hum h'um phat/🔽aom tsand'a ksh'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: ka la ku ru ku ru hum h'um phat/ aom tsand'a ksh'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: kāla kuru kuru huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ caṇḍākṣīsye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom kam ka la bandha bandha hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom kam ka la bandha bandha hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ kaṃkalā bandha bandha huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom pra bh'a ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom pra bh'a ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ prabhāvatīsye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom bi ka ta dam shtrir ni tra sa ya tr'a sa ya hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom bi ka ta dam shtrir ni tra sa ya tr'a sa ya hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vikata-dam-ṣṭr-ī-ni-trā-sa-ya-trā-sa-ya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ma h'a n'a se hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ma h'a n'a se hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahā-nāsā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom su r'a bee ri ni ksho bha ya ksho bha ya hum h'um phat/🔽aom b'i ra ma t'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom su r'a bee ri ni ksho bha ya ksho bha ya hum h'um phat/ aom b'i ra ma t'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ sura-vai-ri-ṇi kṣobhaya kṣobhaya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ virāma-tīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom aa mi t'a bhe hrom hrom hum h'um phat/🔽aom kharba r'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom aa mi t'a bhe hrom hrom hum h'um phat/ aom kharba r'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ amitābha hrīṃ hrīṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ khavāriye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom badzra pra bh'a hra: hra: hum h'um phat/🔽aom lam ke shva r'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom badzra de ha phem phem hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra pra bh'a hra: hra: hum h'um phat/ aom lam ke shva r'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom badzra de ha phem phem hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra-prabhā hrīṃ hrīṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ laṅkeśvara-īye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ vajra-deha pheṃ pheṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom dru matstsha ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom dru matstsha ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ drumacchāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom aangku ri ka phat phat hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom aangku ri ka phat phat hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ aṅkurika phaṭ phaṭ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ airāvaṭīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom aee ra ba t'i ye hum h'um phat; aom badzra dza ti la da ha da ha hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom aee ra ba t'i ye hum h'um phat; aom badzra dza ti la da ha da ha hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra-jaṭila dhaha dhaha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ma h'a bhee ra ba ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ma h'a bhee ra ba ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahā-bhairava-īye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ma h'a b'i ra pa tsa pa tsa hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ma h'a b'i ra pa tsa pa tsa hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahā-vira-pacca pacca hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom b'a yu be ge hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom b'a yu be ge hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ āyur-vege hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom badzra h'um k'a ra bhaksha bhaksha ba sa ru dhi ra aantra m'a l'a ba lam bi ni hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra h'um k'a ra bhaksha bhaksha ba sa ru dhi ra aantra m'a l'a ba lam bi ni hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra hūṃkāra bhakṣa bhakṣa vasarudhiramantra mālāvalambini hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom su ra bhakshi ye dum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom su ra bhakshi ye dum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ suryabhakṣiye duṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom su bvha de grihna grihna sapta p'a t'a la bhu dzam ga sarbam p'a tardzdza ya ta rdzdza ya hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom su bvha de grihna grihna sapta p'a t'a la bhu dzam ga sarbam p'a tardzdza ya ta rdzdza ya hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ suvāca grīha grīha sapta pāṭāla bhujaṅga sarva pātu rājaya tarajjhaya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom shya ma de b'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom shya ma de b'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ śyāmadeviye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra bha dra a'a kaddhya a'a kaddhya hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra bha dra a'a kaddhya a'a kaddhya hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra bhadra ākṛṣṭya ākṛṣṭya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom su bha dre hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom su bha dre hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ subhadrāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ma h'a bhee ra ba hrim hrim hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ma h'a bhee ra ba hrim hrim hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahābhairava hriṃ hriṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ha ya karne hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ha ya karne hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hayakarṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom bi r'u p'aksha dzna dznoo hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom bi r'u p'aksha dzna dznoo hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ virūpākṣa jaṃ jaṃ jaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom kha ga na ne hum h'um phat; aom ma h'a ba la kshm'am kshm'am hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom kha ga na ne hum h'um phat; aom ma h'a ba la kshm'am kshm'am hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ khaganane hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ. Oṃ mahābalakṣamā kṣamā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom tsakra be ge hum h'um phat/🔽aom ratna badzra ham ham hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tsakra be ge hum h'um phat/ aom ratna badzra ham ham hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ cakravaktrāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ ratna vajra haṃ haṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom khanda ro hi hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom khanda ro hi hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ khaṇḍarohini hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ha ya gr'i ba ham ham hum h'um phat/🔽aom shoondi ni ye hum h'um @202b phat; aom a'a k'a  garbhe h'um h'um h'um h'um phat/🔽aom tsakra barm'i n'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom he ru ka ki li ki li hum h'um phat/🔽aom su ra b'i r'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom padma na rte shv'a ri si li si li hum h'um phat/🔽aom ma h'a ba le hum h'um phat/🔽aom bee ro tsa na hi li hi li hum h'um phat/🔽aom tsakra barti ni ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ha ya gr'i ba ham ham hum h'um phat/ aom shoondi ni ye hum h'um @202b phat; aom a'a k'a  garbhe h'um h'um h'um h'um phat/ aom tsakra barm'i n'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom he ru ka ki li ki li hum h'um phat/ aom su ra b'i r'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom padma na rte shv'a ri si li si li hum h'um phat/ aom ma h'a ba le hum h'um phat/ aom bee ro tsa na hi li hi li hum h'um phat/ aom tsakra barti ni ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hayagrīva haṃ haṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ śoṇḍinīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ āgargarbhe hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ cakravartiniye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ heruka kili kili hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ surāvarīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ padmanarteśvarī sili sili hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ mahābalāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ vairocanā hilī hilī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ cakravartiniye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽

original: aom badzra satva dhi li dhi li hum h'um phat/🔽aom ma h'a b'irye hum h'um phat/🔽aom k'a k'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom shva n'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom ya ma d'a dhi ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom ya ma d'u t'i ae hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra satva dhi li dhi li hum h'um phat/🔽aom ma h'a b'irye hum h'um phat/🔽aom k'a k'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom shva n'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom ya ma d'a dhi ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom ya ma d'u t'i ae hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajrasattva dhili dhili hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ mahāvīrye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ kākasye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ ulukaśye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ śvānāsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ sūkārāsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ yamādhyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ yamāntī aḥ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽🔽

original: aom ya ma damshtri n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ya ma damshtri n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ yamāntakrīṇīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ yamāntakamahāroṣaṇāya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis //
translated: By means of these, in due order,

original: dung chen phreng ba blangs nas su //
analyzed: dung chen phreng ba blangs nas su //
translated: one should take up the rosary of great conches,

original: lag g-yon mthe bong srin lag gis //
analyzed: lag g-yon mthe bong srin lag gis //
translated: and with the thumb and ring finger of the left hand

original: gsang sngags dag ni bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: gsang sngags dag ni bzlas pa bya //
translated: recite the secret mantras.

original: dus bzhin ji lta 'dod pa ru //
analyzed: dus bzhin ji lta 'dod pa ru //
translated: At the proper time, as one wishes,

original: rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas pa bya //
translated: the yogin should recite.

original: sgom pa rtse gcig bya ba ste //
analyzed: sgom pa rtse gcig bya ba ste //
translated: One should practice meditation one-pointedly,

original: dam tshig dang ni dam tshig sbyor //
analyzed: dam tshig dang ni dam tshig sbyor //
translated: and with samaya and samaya union.

original: bza' dang bzlas pa bsdus nas su //
analyzed: bza' dang bzlas pa bsdus nas su //
translated: Having gathered the food and recitation,

original: cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyin //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyin //
translated: one should offer the bali in accordance with the rite.

original: dkyil 'khor la ni ci bde bar //🔽gcer bu skra grol 'dug pa yis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la ni ci bde bar // gcer bu skra grol 'dug pa yis //
translated: In the maṇḍala, as one pleases,🔽the one with deliberate behavior should offer the bali,

original: brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin //
analyzed: brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin //
translated: with loose hair and naked.

original: rkang pa g-yas brkyang gnas nas su //🔽mnyam par bzhag ste phyag rgya bcing //🔽mdzub mo 'dud byas gung mo nges par sbyar //
analyzed: rkang pa g-yas brkyang gnas nas su // mnyam par bzhag ste phyag rgya bcing // mdzub mo 'dud byas gung mo nges par sbyar //
translated: Standing with the right leg extended,🔽one should form the mudra with equipoise.🔽The index finger should be bent, and the middle finger definitely joined.

original: mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar //
analyzed: mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar //
translated: The thumb should be firmly joined with the vajra.

original: dpral ba'i dbus kyi phyogs su rab bzhag @203a *//
analyzed: dpral ba'i dbus kyi phyogs su rab bzhag @203a *//
translated: Having placed it in the middle of the forehead,

original: nas // gcu zhing gcu zhing bskor nas 'di brjod do //
analyzed: nas // gcu zhing gcu zhing bskor nas 'di brjod do //
translated: twisting and twisting, one should recite this:

original: aom a'a ra lli ho: dza: h'um bam ho: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stv'am dri shy'a ho:/
analyzed: aom a'a ra lli ho: dza: h'um bam ho: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stv'am dri shy'a ho:/
translated: Oṃ āralli hoḥ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ vajra-ḍākinī samaya stvaṃ dṛśya hoḥ.

original: 'di ni gsum dang bzhi dang ni //
analyzed: 'di ni gsum dang bzhi dang ni //
translated: This should be recited three, four,

original: lnga yi bar du brjod par bya //
analyzed: lnga yi bar du brjod par bya //
translated: or even five times.

original: skra grol gcer bur byung ba yis //
analyzed: skra grol gcer bur byung ba yis //
translated: With loose hair, naked,

original: rnal 'byor mtho ba'i gnas nas langs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mtho ba'i gnas nas langs //
translated: one should rise from the abode of the yoginī.

original: lho phyogs kha bltas gnas pa yi //
analyzed: lho phyogs kha bltas gnas pa yi //
translated: Facing south,

original: mtshan phyed du ni gtor ma sbyin //
analyzed: mtshan phyed du ni gtor ma sbyin //
translated: one should offer the bali at midnight.

original: ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
analyzed: ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
translated: Following the rite,

original: de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te //
analyzed: de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te //
translated: one should incant with the three seed syllables.

original: rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas //
translated: Having opened the vajra palms,

original: gsang sngags 'di dag rab tu brjod //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di dag rab tu brjod //
translated: one should recite these mantras:

original: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
analyzed: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
translated: Oṃ kha kha khāhi khāhi

original: sarba yaksha raksha sa /
analyzed: sarba yaksha raksha sa /
translated: to all yakṣas,🔽rākṣasas,🔽bhūtas,

original: bhu ta / pre ta /
analyzed: bhu ta / pre ta /
translated: pretas,

original: pi sh'a tsa /
analyzed: pi sh'a tsa /
translated: piśācas,

original: aun m'a da /🔽aa pasm'a ra /
analyzed: aun m'a da / aa pasm'a ra /
translated: uṃmādas,🔽apasmāras,

original: d'a ka d'a ki n+ya da ya /
analyzed: d'a ka d'a ki n+ya da ya /
translated: and ḍākas and ḍākinīs.

original: ai mam ba lam grihna tu sa ma ya rakshantu sarba siddhi mme pra yatstshantu /
analyzed: ai mam ba lam grihna tu sa ma ya rakshantu sarba siddhi mme pra yatstshantu /
translated: I am the one who has taken up the vow. Protect me, O Blessed One, grant me all accomplishments!

original: ya thee bam/ ya theshta /
analyzed: ya thee bam/ ya theshta /
translated: With this, with this,

original: bhunydza tha / pi pa tha; ji ghra tha /
analyzed: bhunydza tha / pi pa tha; ji ghra tha /
translated: with eating, with drinking, with chewing,

original: m'a ti kra ma tha /
analyzed: m'a ti kra ma tha /
translated: with the final part,

original: ma ma sarb'a k'a ra ta y'a /
analyzed: ma ma sarb'a k'a ra ta y'a /
translated: with all the parts of the body,

original: sata su kham bi shuddha ye /
analyzed: sata su kham bi shuddha ye /
translated: with the pure body,

original: sa ha yi ka bha bantu h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sa ha yi ka bha bantu h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: with the great bliss, may there be well-being! Hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā!

original: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad //
translated: All heroes and yoginīs

original: bde chen mchan gyis gar mdzad cing //
analyzed: bde chen mchan gyis gar mdzad cing //
translated: dance with the bliss of the great seal,

original: bcom ldan sku gsung thugs la bzhugs //
analyzed: bcom ldan sku gsung thugs la bzhugs //
translated: residing in the Bhagavān's body, speech, and mind.

original: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas te //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas te //
translated: Having equalized the ālikāli,

original: der ni re ba'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: der ni re ba'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: there, with the yoga of aspiration,

original: steng du 'bar ba'i re pha ni //
analyzed: steng du 'bar ba'i re pha ni //
translated: the flame above

original: 'og tu 'dzag par byed pa yin //
analyzed: 'og tu 'dzag par byed pa yin //
translated: causes dripping below.

original: 'dzag pa'i khu ba'i tshul can ni //
analyzed: 'dzag pa'i khu ba'i tshul can ni //
translated: The form of the dripping essence

original: 'chi med thigs pa'i gzugs su 'gyur //
analyzed: 'chi med thigs pa'i gzugs su 'gyur //
translated: becomes the form of the immortal drop.

original: srub dang bsrub pa yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: srub dang bsrub pa yang dag sbyor //
translated: The union of copulation and embrace

original: ye shes me la las kyi rlung //
analyzed: ye shes me la las kyi rlung //
translated: is the wisdom fire, the wind of karma.

original: rab tu @203b bskyod pas byas pa yis //
analyzed: rab tu @203b bskyod pas byas pa yis //
translated: By the stirring of the great bliss

original: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dud pa 'byung //
analyzed: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dud pa 'byung //
translated: The mandala at the navel emits smoke,

original: 'od zer dag ni 'bar bar byed //
analyzed: 'od zer dag ni 'bar bar byed //
translated: and the light rays blaze.

original: dam tshig 'khor lo nges de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsregs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod kyi 'khor lor song ste /
analyzed: dam tshig 'khor lo nges de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsregs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod kyi 'khor lor song ste /
translated: Having burned the commitment wheel and all the tathāgatas, it enters the enjoyment wheel of all tathāgatas.

original: thabs des lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas gnad 'byed pa'i sgo las 'das te byung nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa la ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi blangs te spyi bo'i gtsug gser sgo
analyzed: thabs des lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas gnad 'byed pa'i sgo las 'das te byung nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa la ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi blangs te spyi bo'i gtsug gser sgo
translated: Having circled three times by that method, it emerges from the door of the vital point of the ūrṇā between the eyebrows and enters the golden door of the crown aperture.

original: dz'a landha ra zhes bya bar zhugs te /
analyzed: dz'a landha ra zhes bya bar zhugs te /
translated: Having entered the jālandhara,🔽it enters the interior of the aperture of the teeth and rests in the enjoyment wheel.

original: so'i mtshams kyi bu ga'i nang du song nas longs spyod kyi 'khor lor ngal bsos nas bsregs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so'i mtshams kyi bu ga'i nang du song nas longs spyod kyi 'khor lor ngal bsos nas bsregs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having generated the joy of all the tathāgatas who have been burned, it abides in the mandala of the navel.

original: des skra'i rtse mo 'bum du gshags pa'i cha tsam yang 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa mthong ste dga' zhing ji ltar bde bar gnas so //
analyzed: des skra'i rtse mo 'bum du gshags pa'i cha tsam yang 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa mthong ste dga' zhing ji ltar bde bar gnas so //
translated: He sees the arising and entering of the tip of a single hair divided into a hundred parts.

original: rang lhag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: rang lhag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: With the yoga of the deity who is superior to oneself,

original: thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag /
analyzed: thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag /
translated: one should imagine everything in this way.

original: bsam pa med la bsam pa ste //
analyzed: bsam pa med la bsam pa ste //
translated: The inconceivable is thought,

original: sems kyang mtshon par bya ba min //
analyzed: sems kyang mtshon par bya ba min //
translated: and the mind is not an object of representation.

original: bsam du med pa'i sgom pa yis //
analyzed: bsam du med pa'i sgom pa yis //
translated: The inconceivable meditation

original: dngos dang dngos min rnam spangs yin //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos min rnam spangs yin //
translated: is free from entity and nonentity.

original: sems kyis bsams pa'i sems de ni //
analyzed: sems kyis bsams pa'i sems de ni //
translated: The mind that is thought by the mind

original: rnyed pa gang yin gzung bar bya //
analyzed: rnyed pa gang yin gzung bar bya //
translated: is the object that is apprehended.

original: kha tv'am ga ni lha yi sku //
analyzed: kha tv'am ga ni lha yi sku //
translated: The khaṭvāṅga is the deity’s body.

original: da ma ru @204a *//
analyzed: da ma ru @204a *//
translated: The ḍamaru

original: sgra shes rab yin //
analyzed: sgra shes rab yin //
translated: is wisdom.

original: nyin mo bcom ldan dpa' bo ste //
analyzed: nyin mo bcom ldan dpa' bo ste //
translated: The Bhagavān is the hero of the day,

original: mtshan mo rnal 'byor ma ru bshad //
analyzed: mtshan mo rnal 'byor ma ru bshad //
translated: and at night he is said to be the yoginī.

original: dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni //
analyzed: dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni //
translated: The emanation of pure phenomena

original: phag mo dag gi gzugs su bstan //
analyzed: phag mo dag gi gzugs su bstan //
translated: is displayed in the form of Vārāhī.

original: shr'i gnyis med ye shes te //
analyzed: shr'i gnyis med ye shes te //
translated: The two śṛṅgas are nondual wisdom.

original: he ni rgyu tshogs rnam par spangs //
analyzed: he ni rgyu tshogs rnam par spangs //
translated: He is the abandonment of the accumulation of causes.

original: ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba //
analyzed: ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba //
translated: Ru is free from arrangement.

original: ka ni gang na'ang mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ka ni gang na'ang mi gnas pa'o //
translated: Ka is not located anywhere at all.🔽The resting place of the mind of yoga

original: rnal 'byor sems ni ngal bso sa la; ;mya ngan 'das zhes bstan pa yin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sems ni ngal bso sa la; ;mya ngan 'das zhes bstan pa yin //
translated: is taught to be nirvāṇa.

original: rnal 'byor 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe //
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe //
translated: When the time of the transference of yoga

original: he ru ka sems dpa' rnal 'byor //
analyzed: he ru ka sems dpa' rnal 'byor //
translated: is the yoga of the hero Heruka,

original: lag na me tog sna tshogs bsnams //
analyzed: lag na me tog sna tshogs bsnams //
translated: holding various flowers in his hands,

original: sna tshogs rgyal mtshan bdan can //
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyal mtshan bdan can //
translated: having various banners and flags,

original: sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra sgrog cing //
analyzed: sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra sgrog cing //
translated: making various sounds of music,

original: sna tshogs glu yis mchod par bya //
analyzed: sna tshogs glu yis mchod par bya //
translated: and worshiping with various songs.

original: 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di //
analyzed: 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di //
translated: This concept called “death”

original: mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su khyer //
analyzed: mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su khyer //
translated: carries one to the place of the sky-farers.

original: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: From the Tantra of the Supreme Secret of Supreme Union,

original: gnyis su med par sbyar ba'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: gnyis su med par sbyar ba'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
translated: this is chapter fourteen, on the place of nonduality.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain

original: ma mo'i sgom pa dgye bar bya //
analyzed: ma mo'i sgom pa dgye bar bya //
translated: the arrangement of the mother’s meditation.

original: gsang sngags kun gyi gnas sbyor ba //
analyzed: gsang sngags kun gyi gnas sbyor ba //
translated: The place of union of all secret mantras

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
translated: is the place of all tathāgatas.

original: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad //
translated: Omniscient and all-accomplishing,

original: bde ba chen pos kun la khyab //
analyzed: bde ba chen pos kun la khyab //
translated: And is pervaded by great bliss.

original: mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdag ste //
analyzed: mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdag ste //
translated: The Lord is the master of all the Buddhas,

original: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //🔽aom aam a'am/ ai a'im/
analyzed: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas // aom aam a'am/ ai a'im/
translated: And dwells in the heart of all sentient beings.🔽Om am aam, ai am,

original: aum a'um/ aem aeem/
analyzed: aum a'um/ aem aeem/
translated: Um um, e am, ai am,

original: aom aoom// aam aa: h'um/
analyzed: aom aoom// aam aa: h'um/
translated: Om oam, au am, a am, aḥ hūṃ.

original: 'di ni bcom @204b ldan de nyid kyi //
analyzed: 'di ni bcom @204b ldan de nyid kyi //
translated: This is the very essence of the Bhagavān,

original: he ru ka ni dbang phyug mchog /🔽mkha' la dri med zla ba yi //
analyzed: he ru ka ni dbang phyug mchog / mkha' la dri med zla ba yi //
translated: The Heruka, the supreme lord,🔽In the center of the navel,

original: lte ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya //
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya //
translated: Meditate on the stainless moon in the sky.

original: rim r'im lim l'im/
analyzed: rim r'im lim l'im/
translated: Rim ram lim lai

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni pad 'dab bzhugs //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni pad 'dab bzhugs //
translated: The ḍākinī sits on a lotus petal.

original: kam kham gam gham ngam/
analyzed: kam kham gam gham ngam/
translated: Kam kham gam gham nam,

original: tsam tsham dzam dzham nyam/🔽tam tham dam dham nam/
analyzed: tsam tsham dzam dzham nyam/ tam tham dam dham nam/
translated: Tsam tshaj jam jham ñam,🔽Tam tham dam dham nam,

original: tam tham dam dham nam/
analyzed: tam tham dam dham nam/
translated: Tam tham dam dham nam,

original: pam pham bam bham mam/
analyzed: pam pham bam bham mam/
translated: Pam phambambham mam,

original: de yi thod pa'i dum sogs dang // gtum mig ma la sogs kun gyis //
analyzed: de yi thod pa'i dum sogs dang // gtum mig ma la sogs kun gyis //
translated: In the center of the skull, the skull-garland, Caṇḍālī, and so forth,🔽The wheel of body, speech, and mind,

original: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ste; ;dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ste; ;dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol //
translated: Grant all spiritual powers.

original: yam ram lam wam/
analyzed: yam ram lam wam/
translated: Yam ram lam vam,

original: sham sham sam ham ksham/
analyzed: sham sham sam ham ksham/
translated: Śam śam sam ham kṣam.

original: de yi khva gdong la sogs dang // gshin rje sreg sogs kun gyi 'o //
analyzed: de yi khva gdong la sogs dang // gshin rje sreg sogs kun gyi 'o //
translated: and Yamadādhī and so on.

original: yi ge ksha yi bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: yi ge ksha yi bdag nyid ni //
translated: The nature of the syllable kṣa

original: bde ba chen po'i shu kra'i gzugs //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i shu kra'i gzugs //
translated: is the form of the semen of great bliss.

original: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs //
translated: He is omniscient and sees everything.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin zhing //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin zhing //
translated: He is the abode of all buddhas.

original: kun la khyab cing rtag tu stong //
analyzed: kun la khyab cing rtag tu stong //
translated: He pervades all and is always empty.

original: brjod du med cing phra ba'i dbus //
analyzed: brjod du med cing phra ba'i dbus //
translated: He is inexpressible and in the middle of the subtle.

original: 'di ni tshad med rtag pa'i thugs //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad med rtag pa'i thugs //
translated: This is the immeasurable and eternal mind.

original: rang gi gzugs ni mkha' lta bu //
analyzed: rang gi gzugs ni mkha' lta bu //
translated: His own form is like space.

original: 'di ni bdag nyid bcings pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ni bdag nyid bcings pa ste //
translated: This is the one who is bound by himself.

original: 'di ni dgrol la mkhas pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ni dgrol la mkhas pa yin //
translated: This is the one who is skilled in liberation.

original: 'di ni lte ba'i dbus bzhugs shing //
analyzed: 'di ni lte ba'i dbus bzhugs shing //
translated: He resides in the middle of the navel,

original: shu kra'i gzugs kyis bde chen gnas //
analyzed: shu kra'i gzugs kyis bde chen gnas //
translated: in the form of semen, in the place of great bliss.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of body, speech, and mind,

original: 'khor lo gsum gyi dbus su dgod //
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum gyi dbus su dgod //
translated: he is placed in the middle of the three wheels.

original: 'di ni gsang ba mchog yin te //
analyzed: 'di ni gsang ba mchog yin te //
translated: This is the supreme secret

original: gang la yang ni bstan mi bya //
analyzed: gang la yang ni bstan mi bya //
translated: that should not be taught to anyone.🔽The previously explained mudras, hand implements,

original: sngar bshad phyag dang phyag mtshan dang // go cha yang ni de bzhin te //
analyzed: sngar bshad phyag dang phyag mtshan dang // go cha yang ni de bzhin te //
translated: and armor are also like that.

original: sngar bshad bzhin du bkod nas kyang //
analyzed: sngar bshad bzhin du bkod nas kyang //
translated: Having arranged them as previously explained,

original: phung po @205a *//
analyzed: phung po @205a *//
translated: the aggregates,

original: khams dang skye mched dag /
analyzed: khams dang skye mched dag /
translated: the elements, and the sense bases,

original: dpa' bo'i yan lag rnam dag nyid //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i yan lag rnam dag nyid //
translated: are the pure limbs of the hero.

original: byang chub phyogs kyang de bzhin te //
analyzed: byang chub phyogs kyang de bzhin te //
translated: The factors of awakening are also like that,

original: lugs su 'byung dang ldog pa yis //
analyzed: lugs su 'byung dang ldog pa yis //
translated: in forward and reverse order.

original: sngar bshad 'khor lo rnam par dgod //
analyzed: sngar bshad 'khor lo rnam par dgod //

original: thams cad dkar ba'i mdog can la //
analyzed: thams cad dkar ba'i mdog can la //
translated: All of them are white in color,

original: 'khor lo gsum ni bcu drug go /
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum ni bcu drug go /
translated: with the three wheels having sixteen [spokes].

original: dpa' bo yang ni so sor dgod //
analyzed: dpa' bo yang ni so sor dgod //
translated: The hero is also individually arranged.🔽The yoginī is also individual,

original: rnal 'byor ma yang so sor te; ;rang gi thabs kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yang so sor te; ;rang gi thabs kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: with the union of one’s method

original: gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa yin //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa yin //
translated: dwelling in the state of nonduality.🔽The hero dwells in the state of nonduality

original: dpa' bo'i rang gi rig pa dang // gnyis su med par gnas pa yin //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i rang gi rig pa dang // gnyis su med par gnas pa yin //
translated: with one’s own knowledge.

original: mkha' 'gro sogs dang khyi gdong sogs //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro sogs dang khyi gdong sogs //
translated: The ḍākinīs and so on, the dog-faced and so on,

original: rang gi thabs dang gnyis med gnas //🔽de ni rdo rje snying po'o //
analyzed: rang gi thabs dang gnyis med gnas // de ni rdo rje snying po'o //
translated: dwell in nonduality with one’s own method.🔽That is the vajra essence.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi dam pa ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi dam pa ste //
translated: It is the supreme yoga of the yoginīs,

original: mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa dag /
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa dag /
translated: the most secret hidden reality.

original: rdo rje snying pos zhus nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos zhus nas ni //
translated: Having requested the vajra essence,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin //
translated: The Blessed One has taught.

original: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: In the Tantra of the Supreme Secret, the Supreme of the Supreme,

original: dpal he ru ka dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams sgom pas bskyed pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: dpal he ru ka dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams sgom pas bskyed pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o ////
translated: the glorious Heruka, the dakinis, the heroes, and the yoginis are generated by meditation. This is the fifteenth chapter.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain

original: dang po'i las kyi sgom pa ste //
analyzed: dang po'i las kyi sgom pa ste //
translated: the meditation for beginners,

original: rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog gyur pa //
translated: the supreme yoga practice,

original: gcig car du ni bskyed pa dag /
analyzed: gcig car du ni bskyed pa dag /
translated: the simultaneous generation

original: rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa yin //
translated: taught by Vajragarbha.

original: phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa //
analyzed: phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa //
translated: He has two arms, one face,

original: spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams bsgyur //
analyzed: spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams bsgyur //
translated: and three eyes, with a contorted face,

original: 'jig @205b byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /
analyzed: 'jig @205b byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /
translated: destroying Bhairava and Kalagni,

original: g-yas brkyang ba yis mgo la mnan //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang ba yis mgo la mnan //
translated: pressing on their heads with his right leg extended.🔽He is adorned with the six ornaments, a vajra cross,

original: rgyan drug sna tshogs rdo rje dang // zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rgyan drug sna tshogs rdo rje dang // zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan //
translated: and a half-moon,

original: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs //
translated: wearing a tiger skin as clothing,

original: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with a garland of heads,

original: thod pa kha tv'am ga bsnams shing //
analyzed: thod pa kha tv'am ga bsnams shing //
translated: holding a skull cup and khaṭvāṅga,🔽with a crown of five dry skulls.

original: de ni rdo rje mchog kyang gsor //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje mchog kyang gsor //
translated: He is also the supreme vajra, which is raised up.

original: phag mos kyang ni rnam par khril //
analyzed: phag mos kyang ni rnam par khril //
translated: He is also embraced by Vārāhī.

original: de yi mdog dang phyag gis gnas //
analyzed: de yi mdog dang phyag gis gnas //
translated: He is situated with her color and hands.

original: byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud //
analyzed: byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud //
translated: He embraces her with his two thighs.

original: thod pa rdo rje bsdigs mdzub kyis //
analyzed: thod pa rdo rje bsdigs mdzub kyis //
translated: He has a skull, a vajra, and a threatening forefinger.

original: phyogs su bsdigs shing skra grol la //🔽dum bu'i rgyan gyis ska rags can //
analyzed: phyogs su bsdigs shing skra grol la // dum bu'i rgyan gyis ska rags can //
translated: He threatens the directions, and his hair is loose.🔽He has a belt with pieces of bone as ornaments.

original: 'khor la sogs ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams //
analyzed: 'khor la sogs ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams //
translated: The maṇḍalas of the retinue and so on

original: phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa ste //
analyzed: phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa ste //
translated: have two hands and one face.

original: phyag rgya lnga ni mnyam par sbyor //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga ni mnyam par sbyor //
translated: They are in union with the five symbolic implements.

original: spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs //
analyzed: spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs //
translated: They have three eyes and wrathful forms.

original: thams cad yi dvags gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad yi dvags gdan la bzhugs //
translated: All of them sit on human-corpse seats.

original: sgom pa mchog gi sgom pa'o //
analyzed: sgom pa mchog gi sgom pa'o //
translated: This is the supreme meditation.

original: dbus su khrag 'thung rdo rje ni //
analyzed: dbus su khrag 'thung rdo rje ni //
translated: In the center, Vajraheruka

original: sngo ba'i mdog can bde ba che //
analyzed: sngo ba'i mdog can bde ba che //
translated: is blue in color and has great bliss.

original: padma'i dbus su sgom pa ni //
analyzed: padma'i dbus su sgom pa ni //
translated: He is meditated on in the center of a lotus.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog /
translated: The ḍākinī is yellow in color.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang // mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par ni //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang // mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par ni //
translated: The special heroes and ḍākinīs of the mind wheel

original: dpa' bo mdog ni nag po la //
analyzed: dpa' bo mdog ni nag po la //
translated: are heroes who are black in color.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar ba nyid //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar ba nyid //
translated: The dakinis are white.

original: gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni //
translated: The heroes of the wheel of speech

original: dmar ba'i mdog can cher 'bar ba //
analyzed: dmar ba'i mdog can cher 'bar ba //
translated: are red, blazing greatly.

original: mkha' 'gro'ang de bzhin nag po ste //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'ang de bzhin nag po ste //
translated: The dakinis are also black.

original: sku mdog gnyis su rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: sku mdog gnyis su rnam par bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on the two colors.

original: sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni //
translated: The heroes of the wheel of body

original: zla ba ser skyas legs brgyan pas //
analyzed: zla ba ser skyas legs brgyan pas //
translated: are well-adorned with a pale moon.

original: de @206a *// la mkha' 'gro ma yang dmar //
analyzed: de @206a *// la mkha' 'gro ma yang dmar //
translated: The dakinis there are red.

original: ci 'dod gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: ci 'dod gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin //
translated: They become whatever form one desires.

original: khva gdong la sogs kun ljang gu //
analyzed: khva gdong la sogs kun ljang gu //
translated: Khakhaḍa and so forth are all green.

original: gshin rje sreg sogs nun dud ka /🔽de ltar mdog gi bye brag gis //
analyzed: gshin rje sreg sogs nun dud ka / de ltar mdog gi bye brag gis //
translated: Yama, Agni, and so forth are smoky.🔽Thus, one should know

original: sgom pa'i mchog gis shes par bya //
analyzed: sgom pa'i mchog gis shes par bya //

analyzed: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ste /

original: nam mkha'i mdog can sngo bsangs dang / ser ba dang / ljang gu'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mdog can sngo bsangs dang / ser ba dang / ljang gu'o //

original: shar phyogs kyi sgor khva gdong ma ste /
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi sgor khva gdong ma ste /
translated: At the eastern gate is Kākāsyā.

original: sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'o //

original: byang du 'ug gdong ma ste /
analyzed: byang du 'ug gdong ma ste /

original: ljang gu dang / dmar ba dang / dkar ba'o //

original: nub tu khyi gdong ma ste /
analyzed: nub tu khyi gdong ma ste /
translated: In the west is Śvānāsyā.

original: ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu'o //
analyzed: ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu'o //
translated: [She is] yellow, blue, and green.

original: lho ru phag gdong ma ste /
analyzed: lho ru phag gdong ma ste /
translated: In the south is Śūkarāsyā.

original: dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu'o //

original: me'i phyogs su gshin rje sreg ma ste /
analyzed: me'i phyogs su gshin rje sreg ma ste /
translated: In the southeast is Yamadaṃṣṭrī.

original: dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu'o //
analyzed: dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu'o //

original: bden bral du gshin rje pho nya ma ste /
analyzed: bden bral du gshin rje pho nya ma ste /

original: sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o //
analyzed: sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o //
translated: [She is] blue, white, and red.

original: rlung gi phyogs su gshin rje mche ba ma ste //
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs su gshin rje mche ba ma ste //

original: dud ka dang / dmar ba dang / dkar ba'o //
analyzed: dud ka dang / dmar ba dang / dkar ba'o //
translated: brown, red, and white.

original: dbang ldan du gshin rje 'joms ma ste /
analyzed: dbang ldan du gshin rje 'joms ma ste /
translated: In the northeast, Yamadamstrini,

original: dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o //
analyzed: dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o //
translated: red, blue, and white.

original: thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dang / rab gtum ma la sogs pa rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan pa ral gri dang / cang te'u dang / mgo bo dang / thod pa dang / kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa /
analyzed: thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dang / rab gtum ma la sogs pa rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan pa ral gri dang / cang te'u dang / mgo bo dang / thod pa dang / kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa /

original: padma padma'i dril bu dang / 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dril bu ste //
analyzed: padma padma'i dril bu dang / 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dril bu ste //
translated: Padma holds a lotus and a bell, Cakra holds a wheel and a bell.

original: sku gsung dag ni gnyis po yang //
analyzed: sku gsung dag ni gnyis po yang //
translated: The two, body and speech,

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo ji lta @211a *//
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo ji lta @211a *//
translated: are like the mind wheel.🔽The goddesses hold a small drum, a sword, and a flaying knife,

original: pa'o; ;lha mo cang te'u ral gri dang / gri gug kyang ni de bzhin te //
analyzed: pa'o; ;lha mo cang te'u ral gri dang / gri gug kyang ni de bzhin te //

original: khva gdong la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: khva gdong la sogs pa ni /

original: ral gri dang / cang te 'u dang / gri gug dang / thod pa dang / kha tv'am ga dang / mgo po dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: ral gri dang / cang te 'u dang / gri gug dang / thod pa dang / kha tv'am ga dang / mgo po dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
translated: hold a sword, a small drum, a flaying knife, a skull, a khaṭvāṇga, a head, and a bell.

original: gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa ni /
translated: Yāminī and so forth

original: thod pa dang / kha tv'am ga dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / cang te'u dang / dril bu dang / mgo bo 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: thod pa dang / kha tv'am ga dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / cang te'u dang / dril bu dang / mgo bo 'dzin pa'o //
translated: hold a skull cup, khaṭvāṅga, sword, goad, small drum, bell, and head.

original: de thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: de thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa /
translated: All of them have three eyes.

original: phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: They are adorned with the five symbolic ornaments.

original: na ra'i pags pa mnabs pa /
analyzed: na ra'i pags pa mnabs pa /
translated: They wear human skin.

original: dpa' bo rnams ni /
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams ni /
translated: The heroes

original: g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /🔽thod pa'i phreng ba can /
analyzed: g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa / thod pa'i phreng ba can /
translated: stand in the extended-to-the-right pose.🔽They have garlands of skulls.

original: rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can /
analyzed: rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can /
translated: They have crowns of their own lineage.

original: yi dvags kyi steng na bzhugs pa /
analyzed: yi dvags kyi steng na bzhugs pa /
translated: They stand on corpses.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril ba //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril ba //
translated: They embrace their yoginī with both legs wrapped around.🔽They are naked, with loose hair,

original: gcer bu sla grol ba; dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can //
analyzed: gcer bu sla grol ba; dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can //
translated: and have skirts of human skin.

original: khva gdong ma la sogs pa dang / gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni /
analyzed: khva gdong ma la sogs pa dang / gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni /
translated: The goddesses beginning with Kākāsyā and ending with Yāminī

original: gcer bu skra grol ba /
analyzed: gcer bu skra grol ba /
translated: are naked, with loose hair.

original: yi dvags kyi steng du g-yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
analyzed: yi dvags kyi steng du g-yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
translated: They stand on corpses in the extended-to-the-right pose.

original: spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa /
translated: They have three eyes.

original: phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: Adorned with the five symbolic ornaments,

original: thod pa'i phreng ba can /
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba can /
translated: wearing a garland of skulls,

original: gsus pa rlo ba /
analyzed: gsus pa rlo ba /
translated: with a protruding belly,

original: skye gnas ring ba mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba /
analyzed: skye gnas ring ba mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba /
translated: with a long sexual organ, and a face with bared fangs,

original: thugs rje'i chags pa'i ros rnam par myos pa /
analyzed: thugs rje'i chags pa'i ros rnam par myos pa /
translated: intoxicated by the taste of passion for compassion,

original: 'jigs pa'i g-yo bas 'jigs su rung ba /
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i g-yo bas 'jigs su rung ba /
translated: terrifying with fearsome movements.

original: 'di ltar ma lus bsgoms nas ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar ma lus bsgoms nas ni //
translated: Having thus meditated on everything,🔽one should worship with the wheel of wisdom,

original: ye @211b shes 'khor lo mthong ba dang // ye shes chu sogs aarga dang // dam tshig mchog gis mchod par bya //
analyzed: ye @211b shes 'khor lo mthong ba dang // ye shes chu sogs aarga dang // dam tshig mchog gis mchod par bya //
translated: with water of wisdom and so forth, and with the supreme pledge.

original: mthong ma thag tu dbang yang bskur //
analyzed: mthong ma thag tu dbang yang bskur //
translated: As soon as one sees, one should also confer empowerment.

original: mchod nas thim par byas nas ni //
analyzed: mchod nas thim par byas nas ni //
translated: Having worshipped, one should cause to dissolve,

original: ye shes bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin //
analyzed: ye shes bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin //
translated: and having invoked with the rite of wisdom recitation,

original: btab nas 'thor 'thung rab tu bya //
analyzed: btab nas 'thor 'thung rab tu bya //
translated: one should perform the sprinkling and sipping.

original: srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of life-force and exertion,

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob pa yin //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob pa yin //
translated: one will attain the desired spiritual power.🔽Having recited the pledge wheel,

original: dam tshig 'khor lo bzlas byas nas; ;'chi med ye shes lnga lhan cig /
analyzed: dam tshig 'khor lo bzlas byas nas; ;'chi med ye shes lnga lhan cig /
translated: the five wisdoms of immortality,

original: gsang sngags khro bo'i tshig gis bzla //
analyzed: gsang sngags khro bo'i tshig gis bzla //
translated: one should recite with the words of the wrathful mantra.

original: bde ba'i dngos grub ster bar mdzad //
analyzed: bde ba'i dngos grub ster bar mdzad //
translated: And bestows the attainment of bliss.

original: dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad bya //
translated: One should perform all the maṇḍalas without exception.

original: mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa bya //
translated: One should perform the recitation while equipoised.

original: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga bzhin //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga bzhin //
translated: According to the rite of wisdom and means,

original: rnal 'byor bzlas pa don chen ster //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bzlas pa don chen ster //
translated: the yoga recitation bestows the great meaning.

original: rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dpa'//
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dpa'//
translated: The yoginīs and ḍākinīs are heroes,🔽and they grant the supreme in actuality.

original: mngon sum du ni mchog kyang stsol; ;aom shr'i aa badzra he he ru ru kam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: mngon sum du ni mchog kyang stsol; ;aom shr'i aa badzra he he ru ru kam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ śrī āḥ vajra he he ru ru kāma hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom aa a'a /🔽ai a'i / au a'u ae aee /🔽ao aoo / aam aa: h'um h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom aa a'a / ai a'i / au a'u ae aee / ao aoo / aam aa: h'um h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ a ā.🔽I ī. U ū ai.🔽Oṃ au. Aṃ aḥ. Hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat/🔽aom badzra bee ro tsa n'a ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat/ aom badzra bee ro tsa n'a ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ vajra vairocanāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra barnna n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra barnna n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ sarva buddha ḍākinīye vajra varṇanīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: dpal khrag 'thung dang / phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: dpal khrag 'thung dang / phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
translated: The essence and quintessence of Śrī Heruka and Vārāhī.

original: aom d'a ki n'i d'om d'am hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom d'a ki n'i d'om d'am hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ ḍākinī ḍom ḍam hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom l'a me l'am hum h'um phat; aom khanda ro he kham hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom l'a me l'am hum h'um phat; aom khanda ro he kham hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ khaṇḍarohe kham hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom r'u pi n'i ye rum hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom r'u pi n'i ye rum hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ rūpiṇiye ruṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ka ra ka ra kam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ka ra ka ra kam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ kara kara kaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom pra tsande hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom pra tsande hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ pracaṇḍe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ku ru ku ru ma hum h'um phat/🔽aom nd'a ksh'i ye h'um h'um @212a *//
analyzed: aom ku ru ku ru ma hum h'um phat/ aom nd'a ksh'i ye h'um h'um @212a *//
translated: Oṃ kuru kuru maṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ nandākṣīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: phat/ aom bhandha bhandha kam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: phat/ aom bhandha bhandha kam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ bhandha bhandha kaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom pra bha ba ti ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom pra bha ba ti ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ prabhāvatīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya bam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya bam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ trāsaya trāsaya vaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom mah'a n'a se hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom mah'a n'a se hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahānāse hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ksho bha ya ksho bha ya sam hum h'um phat/🔽aom b'i ra ma t'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ksho bha ya ksho bha ya sam hum h'um phat/ aom b'i ra ma t'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ kṣobhaya kṣobhaya saṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ virāmatiye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom hrom hrom a'am hum h'um phat/🔽aom kharba r'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hrom hrom a'am hum h'um phat/ aom kharba r'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hroṃ hroṃ aṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ khavāriye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom hra: hra: bam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hra: hra: bam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hraḥ hraḥ vaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom lam ke shva r'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom phem phem bam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom lam ke shva r'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom phem phem bam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ maṅkeśvarīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ pheṃ pheṃ vaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom dru ma tstsha ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom dru ma tstsha ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ drumatsaṃye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom phat phat aom hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom phat phat aom hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ phaṭ phaṭ oṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ae ra ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ae ra ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ Airāvatīye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom da ha da ha bam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom da ha da ha bam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ da ha da ha vaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom mah'a bhee ra bi ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom mah'a bhee ra bi ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ Mahābhairavīye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom pa tsa pa tsa mam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom pa tsa pa tsa mam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ pa ca pa ca maṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom b'a yu be ge hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom b'a yu be ge hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ Vāyuvegāye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom bhaksha bhaksha ba sa ru dhi ra aanta m'a la ba lam bi n'am ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom bhaksha bhaksha ba sa ru dhi ra aanta m'a la ba lam bi n'am ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ bhakṣa bhakṣa va sarva rudhiram anta mālava lambināmāye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom su ra bhakshi ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom su ra bhakshi ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ Surābhaksīye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom grihna grihna su sabta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzam ga sarbam p'a tardzdza ya tardzdza ya hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom grihna grihna su sabta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzam ga sarbam p'a tardzdza ya tardzdza ya hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ gṛhṇa gṛhṇa su sat pāta ā la gata bhujaṃga sarva pāta rājāya tarjja tarjja huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom shy'a ma de b'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom a'a kaddhya aaddhya bam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom shy'a ma de b'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom a'a kaddhya aaddhya bam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ Śyāmadevīye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ akaddhya adhyavaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom su bha dre hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom su bha dre hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ Subhadrāye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom hrim hrim mam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hrim hrim mam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hriṃ hriṃ maṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ha ya karnne hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ha ya karnne hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ Hayakarṇīye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom jnoom aom jnoom bam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom jnoom aom jnoom bam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ jhṇom jhṇom vaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom kha g'a na ne hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom kha g'a na ne hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ Khaṅgaṇanīye huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom kshmam kshm'am sam hum h'um phat/🔽aom tsakra be ge hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom kshmam kshm'am sam hum h'um phat/ aom tsakra be ge hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ kṣmaṃ kṣmaṃ saṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ cakravarmiṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ham ham r'a hum h'um phat/🔽aom khanda ro hi hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ham ham r'a hum h'um phat/ aom khanda ro hi hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ haṃ haṃ rā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ khaṇḍarohiṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom him hi ham hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom him hi ham hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hiṃ hiṃ haṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom shoondi n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom shoondi n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ śauṇḍinīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom h'um h'um ham hum h'um phat/🔽aom tsakra warmi ni ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom h'um h'um ham hum h'um phat/ aom tsakra warmi ni ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hūṃ hūṃ haṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ cakravartiniye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ki li ki li ham hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ki li ki li ham hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ kili kili haṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom su b'i re hum h'um phat/🔽aom si li si li bam hum h'um phat/🔽aom mah'a ba le hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom su b'i re hum h'um phat/ aom si li si li bam hum h'um phat/ aom mah'a ba le hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ subhadrāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ sili sili vaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ mahābalāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom hi li hi li bam hum h'um phat/🔽aom tsakra barti ni ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hi li hi li bam hum h'um phat/ aom tsakra barti ni ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hili hili vaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ cakravartiniye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom dhi li @212b dhi li bam h'um h'um phat/
analyzed: aom dhi li @212b dhi li bam h'um h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ dhili dhili vaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom mah'a b'i rye hum h'um phat/🔽aom k'a k'a sy'e hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom mah'a b'i rye hum h'um phat/ aom k'a k'a sy'e hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahāvairāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ kā kāsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom shv'a n'a sye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat/ aom shv'a n'a sye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ ulu kāsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ śvāna kāsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ saukara kāsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ya ma d'a dh'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ya ma d'a dh'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ yamāntakrīḍāya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ya ma du t'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom ya ma damshti n'a ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ya ma du t'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom ya ma damshti n'a ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ yamāntakaromāya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ yamāntakadānavāya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ yamāntakamahāmare hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis //
translated: By means of these, in due order,

analyzed: bzlas dang sgom pa byas nas ni //

original: ye shes bdud rtsi sgom byas nas //
analyzed: ye shes bdud rtsi sgom byas nas //

analyzed: rang gi lha yi sbyor bas gnas // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: one should abide in the yoga of one's deity.🔽This concludes the eighteenth chapter of the Supreme Tantra of Clear Expression,

analyzed: dbang po rnon po'i sgom pa rjes su bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o ////

analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa /

analyzed: de nas mchog gi dam pa bshad //

analyzed: mnyam par sbyor ba'i sdom pa dag /

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom ba mchog /

analyzed: gcig car 'jug pa mthong nas su //

analyzed: a'a li k'a li las byung ba //

analyzed: he ru kar ni bdag nyid byas //

analyzed: ser dang sngo dang ljang ku ste //

analyzed: steng ni dkar po zhi ba'o //

analyzed: spyan gsum thugs rje drag po ste //

original: phag mo yis ni rnam par brgyan //

analyzed: bgegs rnams thams cad 'dul bar mdzad //

original: zla ba phyed dang ral pa 'ching //
analyzed: zla ba phyed dang ral pa 'ching //

analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par gnon //

original: sku la @213a *//
analyzed: sku la @213a *//

analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis mtshan //

analyzed: phyag rgya sdom pa mchog yin te //

original: stag gi pags gi pags gas  sum nabs //
analyzed: stag gi pags gi pags gas  sum nabs //

original: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //

original: rdo rje phag mo dmar mo ste; ;gcer bu skra ni grol ba yin //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo dmar mo ste; ;gcer bu skra ni grol ba yin //

analyzed: de yi sku dang zhal dang mtshan //

analyzed: byin ba gnyis kyis legs par 'khril //

analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can // mchu dang mchu ni bi di dam //

analyzed: g-yer kha yi ni ska rags can //

analyzed: rigs kyi dga' bas rnam par mos //

analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas // phag mo yi ni ku tsa 'dzin // thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //

analyzed: zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'dzin //

analyzed: tshangs pa'i pags pa brkyang nas ni //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro bzhi po rnam par bsgom //

analyzed: sngo dang dur smrig dkar la ser //

analyzed: spyan gsum rnam bsgyur drag po dang // dkar sngon ljang dmar dur smrig ste //

analyzed: de ni rab tu cher 'bar ba'o //

analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyogs su bsgoms nas ni //

analyzed: dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol //

analyzed: g-yon phyogs dmar dang sngo dang ljang //

analyzed: dkar po steng gi zhal de bzhin //

analyzed: ljang dang dmar po ser po ste //

analyzed: steng gi sngon po bde ba'ang de //

analyzed: phyogs kyi gos mchog 'chang ba dang // skra grol ba ni 'jigs pa ste //

analyzed: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //

analyzed: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //

analyzed: na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs //

analyzed: rkang rgyan ru lu ru lu'i sgra //

analyzed: sna tshogs padma'i steng du ni //

analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs te //

analyzed: gdan gcig la ni rnam par bzhugs //

analyzed: snying la dam tshig ye shes ni //

analyzed: de mchog phyag dang phyag mtshan te //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka /

analyzed: mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can //

analyzed: thams cad de ltar bsgoms nas ni //

analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad dang bcas pa //

original: ye shes gcig tu byas nas ni //
analyzed: ye shes gcig tu byas nas ni //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa bzla //
translated: recite the dakini’s binding mantra:

analyzed: aom a'a: shr'i: badzra he he ru ru kam d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat/

analyzed: aom a'a:badzra b'a r'a h'i hye bam/

analyzed: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

analyzed: dpal khrag 'thung dang // phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //

analyzed: aom badzra r'a ki n'i ye hum h'um phat// aom badzra l'a me hum h'um phat/

original: aom badzra khanda ro he hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra khanda ro he hum h'um phat/

analyzed: aom badzra r'u pi n'i ye sv'ah'a /

analyzed: 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis //

analyzed: bzlas pa dang ni bsgom pa bya // dus bzhi'i @214a *//

analyzed: rjes 'brang rim pa yis //

analyzed: dam tshig sdom pa gnyis med pa //

analyzed: mar me lnga yang bza' bar bya //

analyzed: rtag tu dur khrod nang du bsgom //

original: nub bdun du ni sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: nub bdun du ni sbyor ba yis //

analyzed: mi snang dngos grub nges par 'grub //

original: mthong bar byed par yang kun 'gro //
analyzed: mthong bar byed par yang kun 'gro //

original: sna tshogs gzugs can bde ba che //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can bde ba che //

original: bza' ba rnams ni bza' bya zhing //
analyzed: bza' ba rnams ni bza' bya zhing //

original: sgom gyi btung ba'ang de bzhin te //
analyzed: sgom gyi btung ba'ang de bzhin te //

original: phyogs kyi gos can gar gyis ni //
analyzed: phyogs kyi gos can gar gyis ni //
translated: One should dress in the garments of the directions and

analyzed: myos shing myos pa lta bur gnas //

original: grib ma yang ni med pa ru //
analyzed: grib ma yang ni med pa ru //

analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod // ma h'a ru dhir bcas pa yi //

original: dri chen chu ni mnyam ldan pas //
analyzed: dri chen chu ni mnyam ldan pas //

original: m'am sa sna tshogs du ma dag /
analyzed: m'am sa sna tshogs du ma dag /
translated: And the many kinds of wine,

original: rtse gcig pa yi bza' ba bza'//
analyzed: rtse gcig pa yi bza' ba bza'//

original: nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas //
translated: Endowed with the inner nature,

original: rtag tu zhen pas 'gro bar bya //
analyzed: rtag tu zhen pas 'gro bar bya //

original: mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba'i bdag /
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba'i bdag /

original: ye shes mig gis mthong ba yin //
analyzed: ye shes mig gis mthong ba yin //

original: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i sbyor ba'i sdom pa'i cho ga ste le'u bcu dgu pa'o ////

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //

original: cho ga bzang po bzhin du ni //
analyzed: cho ga bzang po bzhin du ni //

analyzed: zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug /

analyzed: yang na zhal ni bcu gnyis te //

analyzed: phyag ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //

original: yang na sna tshogs phyugs kyi zhal //
analyzed: yang na sna tshogs phyugs kyi zhal //

original: phyag ni brgya dang ldan par bya //
analyzed: phyag ni brgya dang ldan par bya //

original: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
analyzed: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //

analyzed: byang chub @214b sems dpa' dpa' bo dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs dang ni //

analyzed: sna tshogs phyag mtshan 'dzin pa dang // sna tshogs pa yi zhal ldan pa //

original: sna tshogs pa yi gar mdzad cing //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa yi gar mdzad cing //
translated: Dancing in various ways,

original: g-yas brkyang pa yi g-yengs pas bzhugs //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang pa yi g-yengs pas bzhugs //
