original: baddha ni / satya hum h'um phat/
analyzed: baddha ni / satya hum h'um phat/
translated: Hum hum phat!🔽You are the lord of the bhutas and the ghosts!

original: bh'u ta tra sa ni /
analyzed: bh'u ta tra sa ni /
translated: Great virtue!

original: ma h'a b'i re pa ra ma siddhe yo g'i bidye shva ra phat/
analyzed: ma h'a b'i re pa ra ma siddhe yo g'i bidye shva ra phat/
translated: You are the accomplished lord of the knowledge of the yoginis!

original: hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Hum hum phat svāhā!

original: rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags so //
translated: This is the root mantra of Vajravārāhī.

original: 'di ni rdo rje phag mo mchog snying po mchog tu grub pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje phag mo mchog snying po mchog tu grub pa yin //
translated: This is the supreme essence of Vajravārāhī, supremely accomplished.

original: gang gis bzlas dang sgom pa yi //
analyzed: gang gis bzlas dang sgom pa yi //
translated: By whom it is recited and meditated upon,

original: de yis las rnams kun 'grub ste //
analyzed: de yis las rnams kun 'grub ste //
translated: all activities will be accomplished by that one.

original: the tshom med par mod la 'grub //
analyzed: the tshom med par mod la 'grub //
translated: It is accomplished instantly, without a doubt.

original: bdag nyid gnas su mchod pa ste //
analyzed: bdag nyid gnas su mchod pa ste //
translated: One should make offerings to oneself in one's own place,

original: phyi rol nam yang ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol nam yang ma yin no //
translated: Never to an external [deity].

original: grub pa'i khrag 'thung de nyid kyi //
analyzed: grub pa'i khrag 'thung de nyid kyi //
translated: The blood-drinking [deity] who is accomplished

original: gsang sngags rtsa ba brgyad ldan pa //
analyzed: gsang sngags rtsa ba brgyad ldan pa //
translated: Has the eight root mantras.

original: aom na mo bha ga ba te b'i re sh'a ya hum h'um phat/🔽aom mah'a kalp'a gni sam ni bha ya hum h'um phat; aom dza t'a ma ku totka ta ya h'um h'um phat/
analyzed: aom na mo bha ga ba te b'i re sh'a ya hum h'um phat/ aom mah'a kalp'a gni sam ni bha ya hum h'um phat; aom dza t'a ma ku totka ta ya h'um h'um phat/
translated: Om namo bhagavate viresaya hum hum phat🔽Om mahakalpagni-sanibhaya hum hum phat🔽Om jatam-akuta-tokataya hum hum phat

original: aom damshtr'a ka r'a lo gra bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya hum h'um phat/🔽aom sa ha sra bhu dza bh'a su r'a ya hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom damshtr'a ka r'a lo gra bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya hum h'um phat/ aom sa ha sra bhu dza bh'a su r'a ya hum h'um phat/
translated: Om dmsatrakaralogra-bhisana-mukhaya hum hum phat🔽Om sahastrabhuja-bhasuraya hum hum phat

original: aom pa ra shu p'a sho dya tra sh'u la kha tv'am ga dh'a ri ni hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom pa ra shu p'a sho dya tra sh'u la kha tv'am ga dh'a ri ni hum h'um phat/
translated: Om parasupashudyatrasula-khatvanga-dharini hum hum phat

original: aom @217a *// by'a ghr'a dzi n'ampa ra dha ra ya hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom @217a *// by'a ghr'a dzi n'ampa ra dha ra ya hum h'um phat/
translated: Om vyagrahina-paradharaya hum hum phat

original: aom mah'a dhu mr'andha k'a ra ba pu sh'a ya hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom mah'a dhu mr'andha k'a ra ba pu sh'a ya hum h'um phat/
translated: Om maha-dhumarandhakara-vapushani hum hum phat

original: 'di ni khrag 'thung gsang sngags te //
analyzed: 'di ni khrag 'thung gsang sngags te //
translated: This is the blood-drinking mantra.

original: bdag nyid bsgom zhing mchod par bya; ;aom na mo bha ga ba te badzra b'a ra hi bam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: bdag nyid bsgom zhing mchod par bya; ;aom na mo bha ga ba te badzra b'a ra hi bam hum h'um phat/
translated: One should meditate on oneself and make offerings.

original: aom a'ary'a pa ra dzi te tree lokya m'a te bidye shva ri hum h'um phat/🔽aom badzra sarba bhu ta bha ya ba he ma h'a badzre hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom a'ary'a pa ra dzi te tree lokya m'a te bidye shva ri hum h'um phat/ aom badzra sarba bhu ta bha ya ba he ma h'a badzre hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ namo bhagavate vajravarāhī vaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ āryāparājite trailokyamāte vidyāśvarī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ vajra sarvabhūta bhaya vahe mahāvajre hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra a'a sa ne aa pa r'a dzi te ba shyam ka ri ne tra bhra ma ci h'um h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra a'a sa ne aa pa r'a dzi te ba shyam ka ri ne tra bhra ma ci h'um h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra āsanī aparājite vajra bhramci hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom sho sha ni ro sha ni kro dha k'a ra li ni hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom sho sha ni ro sha ni kro dha k'a ra li ni hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ śoṣaṇi roṣaṇi krodhakāriṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom tra sa ni m'a ra ni su pra bhe da ni pa r'a dza ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tra sa ni m'a ra ni su pra bhe da ni pa r'a dza ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ trasani marani suprābhaṇi parājayi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom bi dza ye dzam bha ni stam bha ni mo ha ni hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom bi dza ye dzam bha ni stam bha ni mo ha ni hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vijaye jaṃbhani stambhani mohani hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra p'a ra hi ma h'a yo gi n'i k'i me shva ri kha ge hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra p'a ra hi ma h'a yo gi n'i k'i me shva ri kha ge hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra pāramitā mahāyoginī kī meśvarī khage hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: na ma:ni / thams cad du bya'o //
analyzed: na ma:ni / thams cad du bya'o //
translated: Namas to all!

original: gsang sngags 'di yis las kun bya //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di yis las kun bya //
translated: One should perform all actions with this mantra.

original: a'a li k'a li rdo rje ni //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li rdo rje ni //
translated: The vajra of the vowels and consonants,

original: phag mor bdag nyid bsgoms byas nas //
analyzed: phag mor bdag nyid bsgoms byas nas //
translated: Having visualized oneself as Vajravarahi,

original: rtsa ba brgyad kya sngags ldan bas //
analyzed: rtsa ba brgyad kya sngags ldan bas //
translated: one should recite the mantra of the eight root (mantras).

original: bdag nyid kyang ni mchod par bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang ni mchod par bya //
translated: One should also make offerings to oneself.

original: zhal bzhi byin brlabs byas nas su //
analyzed: zhal bzhi byin brlabs byas nas su //
translated: Having consecrated the four faces,

original: aom sum bha ni sumbhas mchod //
analyzed: aom sum bha ni sumbhas mchod //
translated: one should make offerings with Oṃ, Sumbha, and Sumbha.

original: yang na zhal bzhi kun rdo rje //
analyzed: yang na zhal bzhi kun rdo rje //
translated: Or else, all four faces are vajras.

original: de yi lte bar he ru dpal //
analyzed: de yi lte bar he ru dpal //
translated: In their centers is the glorious Heruka.

original: bdag nyid sgom pa byas na ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid sgom pa byas na ni //
translated: Having visualized oneself,

original: 'khor dang bcas pa'ang de bzhin bsgom //
analyzed: 'khor dang bcas pa'ang de bzhin bsgom //
translated: one should also visualize the retinue.

original: ba sha la sogs bza' zhing bsgrub //
analyzed: ba sha la sogs bza' zhing bsgrub //
translated: One should practice eating beef and so forth.

original: bde gshegs bstan la 'gro ba 'dug /
analyzed: bde gshegs bstan la 'gro ba 'dug /
translated: One should remain in the teachings of the Sugata.

original: skye ba can ni ba shar grags //
analyzed: skye ba can ni ba shar grags //
translated: The one who is born is known as Vashar.🔽One should kill those who steal the property of the Three Jewels,🔽who commit the heinous acts,🔽who slander the master,🔽who slander the Mahayana,

original: dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog dang // mtshams med pa ni byed pa dang // gang zhig slob dpon smod @217b pa dang // theg pa chen po smod pa dang // phyugs de rnams ni bsad nas kyang //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog dang // mtshams med pa ni byed pa dang // gang zhig slob dpon smod @217b pa dang // theg pa chen po smod pa dang // phyugs de rnams ni bsad nas kyang //
translated: and those who are cattle.

original: rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'//
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'//
translated: One should eat them together with the yoginis.

original: phyugs de rnams ni dgug pa yang //
analyzed: phyugs de rnams ni dgug pa yang //
translated: One should also summon those cattle.

original: sgrub pas sngon du bskyed pas bya //
analyzed: sgrub pas sngon du bskyed pas bya //
translated: One should do that by generating them beforehand with the sādhana.

original: phyugs bdun dang ni de bzhin phyugs //
analyzed: phyugs bdun dang ni de bzhin phyugs //
translated: The seven animals are the cow, the horse,

original: bong bu mi dang rus sbal dang // khyi dang rnga mo ce spyang rta //
analyzed: bong bu mi dang rus sbal dang // khyi dang rnga mo ce spyang rta //
translated: the donkey, the human, the tortoise, the dog, and the camel.

original: phyugs kyi mar me 'di rnams ni //
analyzed: phyugs kyi mar me 'di rnams ni //
translated: These are the animal lamps.🔽The limbs of the divisions of the practice are renowned.

original: sgrub pa'i dbye ba'i yan lag grags; ;rigs kyi kha dog dbye ba'i phyugs //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i dbye ba'i yan lag grags; ;rigs kyi kha dog dbye ba'i phyugs //
translated: The wealth of the division of the colors of the clans

original: rkang bzhi rnams la glang po che //🔽bya rnams las ni ngang bsgyur te //
analyzed: rkang bzhi rnams la glang po che // bya rnams las ni ngang bsgyur te //
translated: is the elephant among the quadrupeds,🔽the swan among the birds,

original: dud 'gro rnams las mchu g-yo ba'i //
analyzed: dud 'gro rnams las mchu g-yo ba'i //
translated: and the one with a wagging mouth among the animals.

original: lha rnams kha ru lha bshos te //
analyzed: lha rnams kha ru lha bshos te //
translated: The oblation for the gods is in the mouth.

original: 'di ni phyugs kyi brtag par bshad //
analyzed: 'di ni phyugs kyi brtag par bshad //
translated: This is explained as the examination of the animals.

original: grub pa'i sgrub pa rnam bshad pa //
analyzed: grub pa'i sgrub pa rnam bshad pa //
translated: The explanation of the practice of the siddhas🔽is the crow, the hawk, the jackal,🔽the two born, the great mantra,

original: bya rog bya skya lce spyang dang // skye gnyis dang sngags chen po dang // krung krung bzhad dang kang bu ka /
analyzed: bya rog bya skya lce spyang dang // skye gnyis dang sngags chen po dang // krung krung bzhad dang kang bu ka /
translated: the cuckoo, and the owl.

original: bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya //
analyzed: bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya //
translated: One should perform the oblation and bali

original: dngos grub 'dod pas bsgom bya ba //🔽khyi mo nag mo'i 'o ma dang // sran ma nag po 'bras dang ldan //
analyzed: dngos grub 'dod pas bsgom bya ba // khyi mo nag mo'i 'o ma dang // sran ma nag po 'bras dang ldan //
translated: with the desire for siddhi.🔽The milk of a black bitch🔽with black beans and rice

original: ro yi khar ni sbyin sreg bye //
analyzed: ro yi khar ni sbyin sreg bye //
translated: is to be offered in the mouth of a corpse.

original: sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad par bya //
analyzed: sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad par bya //
translated: One should perform one hundred and eight fire sacrifices.

original: de nas ro de langs nas ni //
analyzed: de nas ro de langs nas ni //
translated: Then that corpse will rise up

original: ci bgyi zhes ni smra 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: ci bgyi zhes ni smra 'gyur zhing //
translated: and say, “What can I do?”

original: sa 'og 'gro ba'am ral gri 'am//
analyzed: sa 'og 'gro ba'am ral gri 'am//
translated: One can go underground, or with a sword,

original: tshar gcod phan 'dogs nyid dang ni //
analyzed: tshar gcod phan 'dogs nyid dang ni //
translated: one can destroy or benefit,

original: ril bu mar  sman gser rnams sam //
analyzed: ril bu mar  sman gser rnams sam //
translated: or with pills, ointments, or gold,

original: rkang mgyogs dag gam bcud kyis len //
analyzed: rkang mgyogs dag gam bcud kyis len //
translated: or with swift feet, or with elixirs.

original: gcig cig sbyin par byas nas ni //
analyzed: gcig cig sbyin par byas nas ni //
translated: Having given one of these,

original: 'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min //
analyzed: 'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min //
translated: one will go, but not otherwise.

original: steng dang 'og tu pho nya 'grub //
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu pho nya 'grub //
translated: The messengers above and below

original: @218a *// rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin //
analyzed: @218a *// rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin //
translated: are accomplished without doubt in this tantra.

original: mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma'i bla ma las //
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma'i bla ma las //
translated: From the Guru of the Gurus of the Abhidhana

original: rnal 'byor gyi sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o ////
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o ////
translated: Chapter twenty, the ritual procedures of the yoga vows.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain something else:

original: srung dang phyir zlog rim pa ni //
analyzed: srung dang phyir zlog rim pa ni //
translated: The stages of protection and repulsion,

original: rgyud gzhan las ni sbas pa yin //
analyzed: rgyud gzhan las ni sbas pa yin //
translated: which are concealed in other tantras.

original: srung ba'i mchog ni rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: srung ba'i mchog ni rnyed dka' ba //
translated: The supreme protection is difficult to obtain,

original: rgyud 'dir rab tu bshad par bya //
analyzed: rgyud 'dir rab tu bshad par bya //
translated: but in this tantra it is explained in detail.

original: nges brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i blar //
analyzed: nges brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i blar //
translated: In the Guru of the Gurus of the Abhidhana Tantra,

original: the tshom bza' bar mi bya ste //
analyzed: the tshom bza' bar mi bya ste //
translated: One should not eat with doubt,

original: sems can rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: sems can rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to protect sentient beings,

original: padma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya //
analyzed: padma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw an eight-petaled lotus.

original: padma'i lte ba ge sar can //
analyzed: padma'i lte ba ge sar can //
translated: In the center of the lotus, with stamens,🔽Around that, a variegated vajra,

original: de rgyab sna tshogs rdo rje ste; ;gnod mdzes gsang sngags yang dag sbyar //
analyzed: de rgyab sna tshogs rdo rje ste; ;gnod mdzes gsang sngags yang dag sbyar //
translated: With the mantra of Sumbha perfectly applied.

original: de yi phyi rol ska rags can //
analyzed: de yi phyi rol ska rags can //
translated: Outside of that, with a girdle,

original: 'dab ma bcu drug bri bar bya //
analyzed: 'dab ma bcu drug bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw sixteen petals.

original: der ni cha rnams rnam bkod de //
analyzed: der ni cha rnams rnam bkod de //
translated: There, the parts are arranged,

original: de yis phyi rol yongs su bskor //
analyzed: de yis phyi rol yongs su bskor //
translated: Surrounding it on the outside.

original: mkhas pas lte bar bri ba ni //
analyzed: mkhas pas lte bar bri ba ni //
translated: The wise one should draw in the center

original: rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa //
translated: A vajra with twelve points.

original: de yi lte bar dgod pa ni //
analyzed: de yi lte bar dgod pa ni //
translated: In its center, one should place

original: h'um ni 'jigs pa rnam 'jigs pa //
analyzed: h'um ni 'jigs pa rnam 'jigs pa //
translated: The hum, which terrifies all fears.

original: h'um gi lte bar yi ge pam//
analyzed: h'um gi lte bar yi ge pam//
translated: In the center of the hum, the syllable pam,

original: bam gyi lte bar yi ge gsum //
analyzed: bam gyi lte bar yi ge gsum //
translated: In the center of the bam, the three syllables,

original: bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel zhing bri //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel zhing bri //
translated: Arranged with the name of the one to be accomplished.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni bzhi po dag /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni bzhi po dag /
translated: The four dakinis

original: de yi g-yon nas dgod bskor ba //
analyzed: de yi g-yon nas dgod bskor ba //
translated: Are placed to the left, in order.

original: d'a l'am kham r'um de ru dgod //
analyzed: d'a l'am kham r'um de ru dgod //
translated: Da la, kha ma, ru, and um are placed there.

original: ri r'i li l'i lhan cig tu //
analyzed: ri r'i li l'i lhan cig tu //
translated: Ri, ri, li, li, together with

original: mkha' 'gro dgod cing ming dang ni //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dgod cing ming dang ni //
translated: The ḍākinīs laugh, and the names

original: rnam par spel zhing bri bar bya //
analyzed: rnam par spel zhing bri bar bya //
translated: are increased and written.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rim ji bzhin //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rim ji bzhin //
translated: According to the sequence of the mind wheel,

original: mkhas pas 'dab mar dgod bya ba //🔽kham pram shar gyi 'dab @218b ma la; ;byang du kam tsam nyid yin te //
analyzed: mkhas pas 'dab mar dgod bya ba // kham pram shar gyi 'dab @218b ma la; ;byang du kam tsam nyid yin te //
translated: the wise one should write on the petals.🔽On the petal of khaṃ praṃ śa,🔽in the north is kaṃ caṃ alone,

original: nub tu kam pam kho na 'o //
analyzed: nub tu kam pam kho na 'o //
translated: in the west is kaṃ paṃ alone,

original: lho ru bam mam nyid yin no //
analyzed: lho ru bam mam nyid yin no //
translated: and in the south is baṃ maṃ alone.

original: me sogs dbang ldan phyogs rnams su //
analyzed: me sogs dbang ldan phyogs rnams su //
translated: In the directions of fire and so on,

original: su pam aam kham bam lam hrim//🔽'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis; ;yi ge h'um dang spel nas su //
analyzed: su pam aam kham bam lam hrim// 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis; ;yi ge h'um dang spel nas su //
translated: suṃ aṃ khaṃ vaṃ laṃ hriṃ,🔽these, in the proper sequence,🔽are written with the seed syllables combined with hūṃ.

original: sa bon dag ni bri bar bya //
analyzed: sa bon dag ni bri bar bya //
translated: Kaṃ khaṃ gaṃ ghaṃ ṅaṃ🔽caṃ chaṃ jaṃ jhaṃ ñaṃ🔽ṭaṃ ṭhaṃ ḍaṃ ḍhaṃ ṇaṃ🔽taṃ thaṃ daṃ dhaṃ naṃ

original: kam kham gam gham ngam//
analyzed: kam kham gam gham ngam//
translated: paṃ phaṃ baṃ bhaṃ maṃ🔽yaṃ raṃ laṃ vaṃ

original: tsam tsham dzam/ 'di dag ni /
analyzed: tsam tsham dzam/ 'di dag ni /
translated: śaṃ ṣaṃ saṃ haṃ kṣaṃ

original: padma'i ska rags su bri'o //
analyzed: padma'i ska rags su bri'o //
translated: are written in the lotus belt.

original: rdo rje cha ni bcu gnyis pa //
analyzed: rdo rje cha ni bcu gnyis pa //
translated: The vajra cross is twelvefold,

original: bskor la bin dus rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: bskor la bin dus rnam par brgyan //
translated: surrounded and adorned with bindus.

original: 'dab ma'i phyi rol bcu drug tu //
analyzed: 'dab ma'i phyi rol bcu drug tu //
translated: On the outer petals, in the sixteen directions,

original: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bri //
analyzed: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bri //
translated: a sixteen-spoked wheel is drawn.

original: de 'dir shar phyogs lha sogs pa //
analyzed: de 'dir shar phyogs lha sogs pa //
translated: Here, in the east, the deities and so on🔽are arranged in the proper sequence.

original: g-yon nas bskor zhing dgod par bya //
analyzed: g-yon nas bskor zhing dgod par bya //
translated: and to the left, one should laugh.🔽

original: mkha' 'gro dang ni dpa' bo 'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dang ni dpa' bo 'o //
translated: One should write the names of the heroes and dakinis in the reverse order.

original: aam aa b'am mam p'am mam bam sum sum sham bam sum mam ham bam kham mam tsam ram kham ham sam aam tsam hem sum pam mam beem tsam bam mam/
analyzed: aam aa b'am mam p'am mam bam sum sum sham bam sum mam ham bam kham mam tsam ram kham ham sam aam tsam hem sum pam mam beem tsam bam mam/
translated: Am, avam, mam, pam, mam, vam, sum, sum, sham, bam, sum, mam, ham, bam, kham, mam, tsam, ram, kham, ham, sam, am, tsam, hem, sum, pam, mam, vemam, tsam, bam, mam.

original: 'di ni hri dang spel nas su //
analyzed: 'di ni hri dang spel nas su //
translated: This is combined with hrih.

original: aom dang spel zhing bri bar bya //
analyzed: aom dang spel zhing bri bar bya //
translated: One should write it combined with om.

original: sgrub pa'i ming ni nang du bya //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i ming ni nang du bya //

translated: Sam sam are bestow the fruit of all powers.

original: hi hi dag ni rmongs pa'o //
analyzed: hi hi dag ni rmongs pa'o //
translated: Hi hi are delusion.

original: lam lam dag ni shis pa'o //
analyzed: lam lam dag ni shis pa'o //
translated: Lam lam are auspicious.

original: di di dag ni 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: di di dag ni 'dzin pa'o //

original: dzi dzi dag ni legs par drongs //
analyzed: dzi dzi dag ni legs par drongs //
translated: Ji ji are invite well.

original: hum @221a *// hum dag ni 'khor ba 'o //
analyzed: hum @221a *// hum dag ni 'khor ba 'o //

original: hri hri dag ni gsod pa 'o //
analyzed: hri hri dag ni gsod pa 'o //
translated: Hri hri are killing.

analyzed: dz'am dz'am dag ni rmugs par mdzad pa 'o // ho ho mdzad pa rjes su chags par bya'o // ham ham dag ni srung ba 'o //

original: ho ho dag ni dgyes pa 'o //
analyzed: ho ho dag ni dgyes pa 'o //
translated: Ho ho are delight.

original: tam tam dag ni gdug pa 'o //
analyzed: tam tam dag ni gdug pa 'o //

analyzed: 'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i las thams cad byed pa sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
translated: The teaching of the meditation that performs all the rites for summoning death is the twenty-second chapter.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, moreover, I will explain

original: sngags kyi de nyid cho ga'i rim //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid cho ga'i rim //
translated: the stages of the rite of the reality of mantra,

original: rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste //
translated: taught by Vajra Essence,

original: gsang ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad //
analyzed: gsang ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad //
translated: explained as the supreme of all secrets.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba mchog /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba mchog /
translated: The supreme bliss of the yoginīs

original: rnal 'byor ma yi brgyud pa'i rim //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi brgyud pa'i rim //
translated: is the stage of the lineage of yoginīs.

original: gsang zhing gsang la mchog tu gsang //
analyzed: gsang zhing gsang la mchog tu gsang //
translated: Secret, secret, supremely secret,🔽the supreme meditation of concentration

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: by the application of the stage of creation

original: bsam gtan sgom pa'i mchog yin te //
analyzed: bsam gtan sgom pa'i mchog yin te //
translated: is the supreme bliss of the yoginīs.

original: bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas //
analyzed: bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas //
translated: Having made oneself Heruka,

original: mkha' 'gro mas ni yongs su khyab //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro mas ni yongs su khyab //
translated: one is pervaded by the dakinis.

original: sku lus dmar po 'jigs pa che //
analyzed: sku lus dmar po 'jigs pa che //
translated: The body is red, very frightening,

original: ye shes lnga las nges byung ba //
analyzed: ye shes lnga las nges byung ba //
translated: arisen from the five pristine consciousnesses,🔽red, blue, green,

original: dmar zhing sngo la ljang ba dang // ser zhing zhi la steng zhal dkar //
analyzed: dmar zhing sngo la ljang ba dang // ser zhing zhi la steng zhal dkar //
translated: yellow, peaceful, and the upper face white.

original: spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu gnyis //
analyzed: spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu gnyis //
translated: He has three eyes and twelve arms,

original: g-yas @221b brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs //
analyzed: g-yas @221b brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs //
translated: and stands with his right leg straight.

original: 'jigs byed che dang dus mtshan dag /
analyzed: 'jigs byed che dang dus mtshan dag /
translated: The great Bhairava and Kālarātri

original: skyabs su 'ongs nas zhabs 'og gnon //
analyzed: skyabs su 'ongs nas zhabs 'og gnon //
translated: come for refuge and are pressed underfoot.

original: phyag rgya drug dang zla ba phyed //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug dang zla ba phyed //
translated: He has six mudrās, a half-moon,

original: sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang //
translated: and a vajra cross, and wears a crown of dry skulls.

original: glang po'i pags pa gos su bnabs //
analyzed: glang po'i pags pa gos su bnabs //
translated: He is clad in an elephant hide

original: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //
translated: and is endowed with a vajra and a bell.

original: ral gri mdung ni 'jigs pa'i mchog /🔽thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: ral gri mdung ni 'jigs pa'i mchog / thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
translated: He has a sword and a terrifying spear,🔽a skull cup, and a khaṭvāṅga.🔽He holds a lasso and a goad, and a skull-topped staff,🔽a ḍamaru, and a head of Brahmā.

original: zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog ;cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog ;cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
translated: and a tiara of a garland of skulls.

original: sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
translated: He is adorned with the five buddhas.

original: de mdun rdo rje phag mo ni //
analyzed: de mdun rdo rje phag mo ni //
translated: In front of him is Vajravārāhī,

original: de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin //
analyzed: de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin //
translated: the same color as him and holding the same implements.

original: zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog /
analyzed: zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog /
translated: She holds a lasso and a goad,🔽a ḍamaru, and a head of Brahmā.

original: cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: She is adorned with a garland of heads

original: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril //
analyzed: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril //
translated: and is well wrapped in the two legs.

original: gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pa //
analyzed: gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pa //
translated: The union of nonduality is the equal possession.

original: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
translated: It is adorned with the five symbolic ornaments.

original: ksha yi ye shes las byung ba //
analyzed: ksha yi ye shes las byung ba //
translated: Arisen from the wisdom of the syllable kṣa,

original: de yi sku dang zhal phyag mtshan //
analyzed: de yi sku dang zhal phyag mtshan //
translated: his body, face, hands, and signs

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
translated: are in the center of a moon mandala.

original: ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom //
translated: One should visualize the wisdom being.

original: bcu gnyis cha las nges 'byung ba //
analyzed: bcu gnyis cha las nges 'byung ba //
translated: Arisen from the twelve vowels,

original: dam tshig sems dpa' bde ba che //
analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa' bde ba che //
translated: the pledge being is great bliss.

original: thams cad mkhyen rpa nges 'byung ba //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen rpa nges 'byung ba //
translated: Arisen from the omniscient one,

original: sngags kyi rgyud ni 'di ru bzla //
analyzed: sngags kyi rgyud ni 'di ru bzla //
translated: one should recite the mantra here.

original: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam/🔽aa a'a / ai a'i /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam/ aa a'a / ai a'i /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra he he ru ru kaṃ🔽a ā / i ī /

original: au a'u / ae aee /
analyzed: au a'u / ae aee /
translated: u ū / e ai /

original: ao aoo // aam aa:/
analyzed: ao aoo // aam aa:/
translated: o au / aṃ aḥ.

original: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: aom aa a'a aa @222a *//
analyzed: aom aa a'a aa @222a *//
translated: Oṃ a ā / aḥ /🔽aṃ aḥ / huṃ huṃ phaṭ.

original: aa:h'um h'um phat/ snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: aa:h'um h'um phat/ snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o //
translated: This is the essence and the close essence.

original: aom badzra b'a ra hi aa a'a /🔽ai a'i / au a'u /
analyzed: aom badzra b'a ra hi aa a'a / ai a'i / au a'u /

original: ae aee / ao aoo /
analyzed: ae aee / ao aoo /
translated: e ai / o au /

original: aam aa:h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aam aa:h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: aṃ aḥ / huṃ huṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye aa a'a aam a'a: hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye aa a'a aam a'a: hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: lha mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: lha mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o //

analyzed: aom d'a k'i n'i rim hum h'um phat/ aom l'a me r'im hum h'um phat/

original: aom khanda ro he lim hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom khanda ro he lim hum h'um phat/

analyzed: aom ru pi n'i ye l'im hum h'um phat/

translated: Oṃ ham hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: 'di dag ni dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor gyi snying po'i gsang sngags gsang ba'i mchog tu gyur pa /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor gyi snying po'i gsang sngags gsang ba'i mchog tu gyur pa /
translated: These are the secret mantras of the essence of the retinue of heroes and yoginīs, which are the supreme secrets.

original: de nyid sbas pa 'khor lo gsum gyi yin te /
analyzed: de nyid sbas pa 'khor lo gsum gyi yin te /
translated: The one who is hidden is of the three wheels.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar //
translated: The hero of the wheel of mind is red,

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni sngon po ste //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni sngon po ste //
translated: and the dakini is blue.

original: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //
translated: He is endowed with the vajra and the bell,

original: 'jigs byed chen po bzhin rnam sgyur //
analyzed: 'jigs byed chen po bzhin rnam sgyur //

original: zhe sdang gis khyab bde chen po //
analyzed: zhe sdang gis khyab bde chen po //
translated: He is pervaded by hatred and is of great bliss.

original: gsung gi 'khor lo dpa' bo dkar //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo dpa' bo dkar //
translated: The hero of the wheel of speech is white,

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni dmar po ste //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni dmar po ste //
translated: and the dakini is red.

original: padma dril bu mnyam par ldan //
analyzed: padma dril bu mnyam par ldan //
translated: He is endowed with the lotus and the bell,

original: 'dod chags kyis khyab bde chen po //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis khyab bde chen po //
translated: and he is pervaded by desire and is of great bliss.

original: sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ser //
analyzed: sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ser //
translated: The hero of the wheel of body is yellow,

original: mkha' 'gro ma dkar me yi mdog /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma dkar me yi mdog /
translated: and the dakini is white, the color of fire.

original: gti mug gis khyab bde ba che //
analyzed: gti mug gis khyab bde ba che //

original: mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha mo rnams //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha mo rnams //

original: sna tshogs mdog can snod chen po'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs mdog can snod chen po'o //

original: khva gdong la sogs lha mo rnams //
analyzed: khva gdong la sogs lha mo rnams //

original: dmar ser dkar la ljang gu'o //
analyzed: dmar ser dkar la ljang gu'o //
translated: are orange, white, and green.

original: gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams //
analyzed: gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams //

original: sngo zhing ser la lngang ba dang // de bzhin dkar ba'i mdog can no //
analyzed: sngo zhing ser la lngang ba dang // de bzhin dkar ba'i mdog can no //

analyzed: 'khor la sogs pa thams cad kun / spyan gsum g-yas brkyangs zhabs kyis @223a *//
translated: All the retinue and so forth🔽are seated with three eyes, right leg extended,

original: bzhugs // dpa' bo stag gi bags mnabs shing //
analyzed: bzhugs // dpa' bo stag gi bags mnabs shing //

original: lha mo thams cad gcer bu ste //
analyzed: lha mo thams cad gcer bu ste //

original: skra grol ba ni rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: skra grol ba ni rnam par mdzes //

analyzed: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril // dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can //

original: thams cad thod ba'i phreng ba 'chang //
analyzed: thams cad thod ba'i phreng ba 'chang //

original: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //

original: thod pa kha tv'am ga 'dzin cing //
analyzed: thod pa kha tv'am ga 'dzin cing //

original: dpa' bo dang ni lha mo rnams //
analyzed: dpa' bo dang ni lha mo rnams //

analyzed: thod pa rdo rje padma dang // 'khor lo yang ni de bzhin no //
translated: and wheel.🔽The ḍākinīs and so forth, the owl-faced,

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma sogs khva gdong dang // gshin tu sreg sogs lha mo rnams; ;thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //

original: me long dri dang ro dang reg /
analyzed: me long dri dang ro dang reg /

original: gos mchog yid du 'ong ba dang // cang te'u dang ni dril bu 'dzin //
analyzed: gos mchog yid du 'ong ba dang // cang te'u dang ni dril bu 'dzin //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni thod pa dang // kha tv'am ga yang 'dzin mdzad cing //
translated: khaṭvāṅgas, and khatvāṅgas.

original: dril bu cang te'u gri gug bsnabs //
analyzed: dril bu cang te'u gri gug bsnabs //

original: khva gdong la sogs lha mo rnams //
analyzed: khva gdong la sogs lha mo rnams //

original: phyag mtshan 'di yis rab tu brtag /
analyzed: phyag mtshan 'di yis rab tu brtag /
translated: are distinguished by these hand implements.

original: thams cad yi dvags gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad yi dvags gdan la bzhugs //

original: phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /
analyzed: phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /
translated: They are supreme, wearing the garments of the directions.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo drag po ste //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo drag po ste //
translated: The mind wheel is wrathful,

original: gsung gi 'khor lo bskyod pa'i zhal //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo bskyod pa'i zhal //
translated: the speech wheel is the face of Aṭṭahāsa,

original: sku yi 'khor lo zhi ba ste //
analyzed: sku yi 'khor lo zhi ba ste //
translated: and the body wheel is peaceful.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni bzhin rnam sgyur //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni bzhin rnam sgyur //

original: ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsgoms nas ni //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsgoms nas ni //

original: dbus kyi gtso bor rnam par brtag /
analyzed: dbus kyi gtso bor rnam par brtag /

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am //

original: khro bo sna tshogs du @223b ma 'am; ;kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa 'am //
analyzed: khro bo sna tshogs du @223b ma 'am; ;kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa 'am //

original: ma mo rigs kyi khyad par dang // 'od zer can nam skul byed ma //
analyzed: ma mo rigs kyi khyad par dang // 'od zer can nam skul byed ma //

original: shes rab pha rol phyin de bzhin //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin de bzhin //

original: gang dang gang dag sgom pa ni; ;yid kyi dbang po sbyor ba dag /
analyzed: gang dang gang dag sgom pa ni; ;yid kyi dbang po sbyor ba dag /

original: de yis dregs par byas pa ni //
analyzed: de yis dregs par byas pa ni //

original: sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin //

original: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' ni //

original: sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'gro bar gnas //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'gro bar gnas //
translated: dwells in the world with various forms.

original: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad //

original: bde ba chen pos kun khyab yin //🔽mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: bde ba chen pos kun khyab yin // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: pervading all with great bliss.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the teaching on the meditation of the suchness of the secret commitments of yoginīs from the Tantra of the Supreme Jewel of the Great Expanse, the Unexcelled Tantra of the Supreme Vehicle.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro rigs kyi cho ga'i rim; ;sna tshogs du ma'i rigs su bshad //
translated: explained as the many various families.

original: mdor bsdus na ni gsum dang ldan //
analyzed: mdor bsdus na ni gsum dang ldan //

original: drug tu yang ni rab tu grags //
analyzed: drug tu yang ni rab tu grags //

original: rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bla ma ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bla ma ste //

original: mkha' 'gro ma 'khor la sogs kun //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma 'khor la sogs kun //
translated: all the retinues of ḍākinīs and so forth,

original: khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa //
analyzed: khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa //

original: rigs las yang dag 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: rigs las yang dag 'byung ba yin //

original: sku kun so sor 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: sku kun so sor 'byung ba ste //
translated: The bodies all arise individually,

original: gzhan du thams cad ma mo'i rigs //
analyzed: gzhan du thams cad ma mo'i rigs //
translated: And all the others are the mother family.

original: dga' zhing dgyes la yid 'ong pa //
analyzed: dga' zhing dgyes la yid 'ong pa //

original: yid las skye zhing 'byung ba yin //🔽bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i rigs kyi bdag pos de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i sa bon @224a *//
analyzed: yid las skye zhing 'byung ba yin // bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i rigs kyi bdag pos de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i sa bon @224a *//
translated: They arise from the mind.

original: 'di bshad cing bstan pa /
analyzed: 'di bshad cing bstan pa /
translated: The Blessed One, the lord of the family of bliss, the great delight, explained and taught this seed of the essence of the secret of thatness:

original: h'um brum aam hr'im kham bam/
analyzed: h'um brum aam hr'im kham bam/
translated: Hum, Brum, Am, Hrim, Kham, Vam.

original: de nas sngags chen bshad pa yis //
analyzed: de nas sngags chen bshad pa yis //
translated: Then, by explaining the great mantra,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sras po rnams //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sras po rnams //

original: rab tu g-yo zhing brgyal nas kyang //
analyzed: rab tu g-yo zhing brgyal nas kyang //

original: rdo rje ye shes rjes su dran //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes rjes su dran //

original: mi 'khrugs pa dang rtag pa'i rigs //
analyzed: mi 'khrugs pa dang rtag pa'i rigs //

original: rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te //

original: 'od dpag med dang don yod grub //
analyzed: 'od dpag med dang don yod grub //
translated: Amitabha and Amoghasiddhi,🔽Vajrasattva and great bliss—

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che; ;'di ltar sangs rgyas sku lus kyang //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che; ;'di ltar sangs rgyas sku lus kyang //
translated: In this way, the buddha's body

analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab tu grags //

original: thog mar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste //
analyzed: thog mar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste //

analyzed: gnyis pa sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin //

original: gsum pa rin chen mkha' 'gro ste //
analyzed: gsum pa rin chen mkha' 'gro ste //

original: bzhi pa padma'i mkha' 'gro yin //
analyzed: bzhi pa padma'i mkha' 'gro yin //

original: lnga pa sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste //
analyzed: lnga pa sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste //

original: drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' yin //
analyzed: drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' yin //

original: lnga po he ru kar shes bya //
analyzed: lnga po he ru kar shes bya //

analyzed: rdo rje dpa' bo yang de nyid; ;nam mkha'i zas kyis longs spyod cing //

analyzed: zla ba'i zas kyi longs kyang spyod //

original: sprul pa'i longs spyod nam mkha' ste //
analyzed: sprul pa'i longs spyod nam mkha' ste //

original: padma'i zas kyi longs spyod kyang //

analyzed: sna tshogs longs spyod sprul pa ste //

original: sna tshogs rigs kyi mchog dam pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs rigs kyi mchog dam pa //

original: mkha' mnyam dri med rnam par dag /
analyzed: mkha' mnyam dri med rnam par dag /

analyzed: gangs kyi rang bzhin lta bur bsil //

analyzed: dag pa'i mdog can mchog gi mdog /

analyzed: zla ba'i zer dang 'dra ba'i mchog /

analyzed: spyan gsum skal pa sna tshogs bzang //

analyzed: zla ba nyi ma'i dbus na gnas //

original: rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs //

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'ang de bzhin te //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'ang de bzhin te //

analyzed: phyag rgya drug ni thams cad rgya //

analyzed: rma bya dang ni nam mkha' lding //

analyzed: de yi steng du yi dvags gdan //

analyzed: bsgoms na dngos grub rab tu stsol //

analyzed: rdo rje lag gis sa la reg /

analyzed: rdo rje dril bu dkur brten cing //

analyzed: thams cad snyems par rnam bsgoms te //

original: rigs kyi rdo rje mchog dam pa //
analyzed: rigs kyi rdo rje mchog dam pa //

original: dkyil 'khor drug ni bri bar bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor drug ni bri bar bya //

original: sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
analyzed: sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //

analyzed: rdo rje 'khor los bskor ba ste //

analyzed: rin chen padmas de bzhin bskor; ;sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba ste //

analyzed: khang pa brtsegs pa yid 'ong mchog /

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //

analyzed: de yi shar phyogs kyi sgo la //

analyzed: lho ru aar bu da na mche ba rnam @225a *//

original: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba ste /
analyzed: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba ste /

original: dpa' bo sku mdog nag po /
analyzed: dpa' bo sku mdog nag po /

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma thal ba dang / sprin gyi mdog can /

original: dpa' bo ni /
analyzed: dpa' bo ni /
translated: The hero

original: rdo rje dang / rdo rje dril bu dang / mkha' 'gro ma ni /
analyzed: rdo rje dang / rdo rje dril bu dang / mkha' 'gro ma ni /
translated: holds a vajra and a vajra bell, and the dakini

original: thod pa dang // rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo //
analyzed: thod pa dang // rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo //
translated: holds a skull and makes a threatening gesture with a vajra.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro bde ba chen po'o //
translated: In the middle of the mandala of Vairochana is the Blessed One, the dakini of the Buddha, great bliss.

original: shar phyogs kyi sgor go da ba rin lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo can ma'o //
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi sgor go da ba rin lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo can ma'o //
translated: At the eastern gate is Godavari, the enemy of gods, and the hero-minded one.

original: byang du r'a me shva ra na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma'o //
analyzed: byang du r'a me shva ra na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma'o //
translated: In the north is Rameśvara, Amitābha, and the dwarf.

original: nub du de b'i ko ta na rdo rje 'od dang / langka'i dbang phyug ma'o //
analyzed: nub du de b'i ko ta na rdo rje 'od dang / langka'i dbang phyug ma'o //
translated: In the west is Devakōṭa, Vajraprabha, and the lord of Laṅkā.

original: lho ru m'a la ba na rdo rje sku dang / shing grib ma'o //
analyzed: lho ru m'a la ba na rdo rje sku dang / shing grib ma'o //
translated: In the south is Mālava, Vajrakāya, and the tree-shaded one.

original: dpa' bo'i sku lus dkar po /
analyzed: dpa' bo'i sku lus dkar po /
translated: The hero's body is white.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'o //
translated: The dakini is yellow.

original: dri ma med pa'i sa na dbus ma ste /
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i sa na dbus ma ste /
translated: On the stainless grounds, it is central.🔽

original: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'o //
translated: On the stainless stage, the central one is the dakini of the Buddha.

original: 'od byed pa'i sa'i dbus na rin chen mkha' 'gro ste /
analyzed: 'od byed pa'i sa'i dbus na rin chen mkha' 'gro ste /
translated: On the stage of the Luminous, the central one is the dakini of the Jewel.

original: shar gyi sgo ru k'a ma r'u pa na myu gu can dang / sa srung ma'o //
analyzed: shar gyi sgo ru k'a ma r'u pa na myu gu can dang / sa srung ma'o //
translated: At the eastern gate, in Kámarupa, are Kumara and Vasudhara.

original: byang du ao tre na rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'o //
analyzed: byang du ao tre na rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'o //
translated: In the north, in Oḍra, are Vajkeśarin and Mahábhairava.

original: nub tu tri sha ku ni na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o //
analyzed: nub tu tri sha ku ni na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o //
translated: In the west, in Triśákuni, are Mahāvīra and Väyuvegā.

original: lho ru ko sa la na rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste dpa' bo ser po /
analyzed: lho ru ko sa la na rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste dpa' bo ser po /
translated: In the south, in Kosala, are Vajrahūṁkāra and Surābhakṣi. The heroes are yellow.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu'o //
translated: The dakinis are green.

original: 'od 'gro ba'i sa'i dbus su padma'i mkha' 'gro //
analyzed: 'od 'gro ba'i sa'i dbus su padma'i mkha' 'gro //
translated: On the stage of the Radiant, the central one is the dakini of the Lotus.

original: de'i shar phyogs kyi @225b sgor ka lingka na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo'o //
analyzed: de'i shar phyogs kyi @225b sgor ka lingka na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo'o //
translated: At the eastern gate, in Kaliṅga, are Subhadra and Śyāmadevī.

original: byang du lam p'a ka na rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang ma'o //
analyzed: byang du lam p'a ka na rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang ma'o //
translated: In the north, in Lampaka, are Vajrabhadra and Subhadrā.

original: nub tu kam ci na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma'o //
analyzed: nub tu kam ci na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma'o //
translated: In the west, in Kāñci, are Mahābhairava and Hayakarṇī.

original: lho ru hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste /
analyzed: lho ru hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste /
translated: In the south, in the Himalayas, is Ami-tabha and Hayakarni.

original: dpa' bo dmar po //
analyzed: dpa' bo dmar po //
translated: The hero is red.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni /
translated: The dakini is white.

original: dkar mo'o // sbyang dka' ba'i dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro /
analyzed: dkar mo'o // sbyang dka' ba'i dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro /
translated: In the center of Hard-to-Purify is Vajra-dakini.

original: de'i shar gyi sgor pre ta pu rin stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o //
analyzed: de'i shar gyi sgor pre ta pu rin stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o //
translated: At its eastern gate, in Pretapuri, is Mahabala and Cakravega.

original: byang du gri ha de ba ta na rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma'o //
analyzed: byang du gri ha de ba ta na rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma'o //
translated: In the north, in Godavari, is Vajraratna and Bhrikuti.

original: nub tu soo r'ashta na rta mgrin dang / chang tshong ma'o //
analyzed: nub tu soo r'ashta na rta mgrin dang / chang tshong ma'o //
translated: In the west, in Sourashtra, is Hayagriva and Suratama.

original: lho ru su barna dv'i pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o //
analyzed: lho ru su barna dv'i pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o //
translated: In the south, in Suvarnadvipa, is Akasagarbha and Cakravarmi.

original: dpa' bo nag po /
analyzed: dpa' bo nag po /
translated: The hero is black.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ser mo'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ser mo'o //
translated: The dakini is yellow.

original: mngon du gyur pa'i sa'i dbus su sna tshogs mkha' 'gro /
analyzed: mngon du gyur pa'i sa'i dbus su sna tshogs mkha' 'gro /
translated: In the center of the Manifestation stage is the Diverse Dakini.

original: de'i shar phyogs kyi sgor na ga ra na he ru ka dang / ra ba dpa' mo'o //
analyzed: de'i shar phyogs kyi sgor na ga ra na he ru ka dang / ra ba dpa' mo'o //
translated: At its eastern gate, in Nagara, is Heruka and Ravira.

original: byang du sindhu na padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma'o //
analyzed: byang du sindhu na padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma'o //
translated: In the north, in Sindhu, is Padmanarteshvara and Mahabala.

original: nub tu ma ru tan rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma'o //
analyzed: nub tu ma ru tan rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma'o //
translated: In the west, Marutānī is yellow and has Vairocana, and Cakravarmiṇī.

original: lho ru ku lu t'a na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson chen mo ste /
analyzed: lho ru ku lu t'a na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson chen mo ste /
translated: In the south, Kulotānī is red and has Vajrasattva and Mahāvīryā.

original: dpa' bo ni /
analyzed: dpa' bo ni /
translated: The heroes

original: sna tshogs kyi mdog can la /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi mdog can la /
translated: are of various colors.

original: mkha' 'gro ma dud pa'i mdog can no //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma dud pa'i mdog can no //
translated: The ḍākinīs are the color of smoke.

original: dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol tu //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol tu //
translated: Outside of that maṇḍala

original: yi dvags phreng bas yongs su bskor //
analyzed: yi dvags phreng bas yongs su bskor //
translated: it is completely surrounded by a garland of ghosts.

original: de yi phyi rol kun rdo rje //
analyzed: de yi phyi rol kun rdo rje //
translated: Outside of that is a vajra

original: zur du mkha' 'gro ma yang bri //
analyzed: zur du mkha' 'gro ma yang bri //
translated: and the ḍākinīs are drawn in the corners.

original: mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs @226a *//
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs @226a *//
translated: The ḍākinīs, Lāmā, Khaṇḍarohā, and Rūpiṇī

original: can ma; ;thod pa bzhi ni mtshams su bri //
analyzed: can ma; ;thod pa bzhi ni mtshams su bri //
translated: are drawn in the four intermediate directions.

original: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mtshams su ni //
analyzed: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mtshams su ni //
translated: In the intermediate directions of the central maṇḍala

original: ring du song sa mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: ring du song sa mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: are the ḍākinīs Dūrāngamā,

original: l'a ma mi g-yo ba yi sa //🔽legs pa'i blo gros dum skyes ma //
analyzed: l'a ma mi g-yo ba yi sa // legs pa'i blo gros dum skyes ma //
translated: Lāmā, Acalā,🔽Saṃprāptā, Khaṇḍarohā,

original: gzugs can ma ni chos kyi sprin //
analyzed: gzugs can ma ni chos kyi sprin //
translated: and Rūpiṇī, Dharmadhātvīśvarī.🔽They are blue, yellow, green,

original: sngo zhing ser la ljang ba dang // bzhi pa dmar ba'i mdog can yin //
analyzed: sngo zhing ser la ljang ba dang // bzhi pa dmar ba'i mdog can yin //
translated: and the fourth is red.

original: khva gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma; ;sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrog ma //
analyzed: khva gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma; ;sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrog ma //
translated: The dakinis with faces of a crane and so forth,🔽are of various colors and are captivating.

original: gshin rje sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: gshin rje sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: The dakinis with faces of Yama, Agni and so forth,

original: phyed ni bud med dbang phyug zhal //
analyzed: phyed ni bud med dbang phyug zhal //
translated: are half-female-half-lordly-face.

original: dpa' bo thams cad g-yas brkyang gnas //
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad g-yas brkyang gnas //
translated: All the heroes stand with the right leg extended,

original: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with the five symbolic ornaments,

original: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs //🔽mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs // mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: wearing tiger-skin skirts,🔽adorned with garlands of heads,

original: phyogs kyi gos 'chang skra grol ba //
analyzed: phyogs kyi gos 'chang skra grol ba //
translated: wearing the garments of the directions, with loose hair,

original: yid 'ong mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs //
analyzed: yid 'ong mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs //
translated: the delightful type of dakinis.

original: thams cad yi dvags steng du bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad yi dvags steng du bzhugs //
translated: All of them stand upon corpses.

original: dkyil 'khor mchog ni rnam par bsgoms //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor mchog ni rnam par bsgoms //
translated: One should visualize the supreme mandala.

original: padma la gnas 'khor lo ni //
analyzed: padma la gnas 'khor lo ni //
translated: The wheel is located in the lotus,

original: dkyil 'khor sdom pa'i mchog yin no //🔽thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sdom pa'i mchog yin no // thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
translated: the supreme binding of the mandala.🔽The skull cup and khaṭvāṅga🔽are in the right hands.

original: cang te'u ni phyag g-yas na //
analyzed: cang te'u ni phyag g-yas na //
translated: The damaru is in the left hands.

original: 'di ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs //
analyzed: 'di ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs //
translated: The dakini’s form is thus

original: phyag mtshan dag gis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: phyag mtshan dag gis rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with symbolic implements.

original: khva gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: khva gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: The dakinis with faces of a crane and so forth,

original: lcags kyu zhags pa la sogs mtshan //
analyzed: lcags kyu zhags pa la sogs mtshan //
translated: The attributes of the iron hook, noose, and so forth,

original: g-yon par kha tv'am g-yas par ni //
analyzed: g-yon par kha tv'am g-yas par ni //
translated: are in the left and right hands,🔽the noose, the chain, and likewise the bell,

original: ji srid zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu yang ni de bzhin @226b no; ;gshin rje sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: ji srid zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu yang ni de bzhin @226b no; ;gshin rje sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: and the dakinis of Yama, Agni, and so forth.

original: me long dang ni pi wang dang // dri dang ro ni g-yas pa na //
analyzed: me long dang ni pi wang dang // dri dang ro ni g-yas pa na //
translated: The mirror, the lute, the scent, and the taste are in the right hands,

original: g-yon pa thod pa kha tv'am ga /🔽dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i //
analyzed: g-yon pa thod pa kha tv'am ga / dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i //
translated: and the skull cup and the khaṭvāṅga are in the left hands.

original: rang__ gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: rang__ gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can //
translated: The heads of the families are on the crowns of their heads,

original: thod pa'i steng na yang dag gnas //
analyzed: thod pa'i steng na yang dag gnas //
translated: perfectly abiding in the skull cups.

original: 'khor lo so sor bsgoms nas ni //
analyzed: 'khor lo so sor bsgoms nas ni //
translated: Having meditated on the individual wheels,

original: 'khor dang bcas pas yongs su khyab //
analyzed: 'khor dang bcas pas yongs su khyab //
translated: they are pervaded by the retinue.

original: ye shes sems dpa' thugs kar blta //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' thugs kar blta //
translated: The gnosis being is seen in the heart.🔽Having seen the wheel of gnosis🔽through the yoga of all yogas,

original: rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: it dissolves into the meditation.🔽The gnosis of awakened body, speech, and mind🔽is conferred with empowerment and emanated in stages.🔽oṃ āḥ vaṃ hūṃ

original: ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas //
translated: The gnosis wheel is seen🔽through the yoga of all yogas,

original: bsgoms pas thim par byas nas su //
analyzed: bsgoms pas thim par byas nas su //
translated: it dissolves into the meditation.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis //
translated: The gnosis of awakened body, speech, and mind

original: dbang bskur nas ni rim par spro //
analyzed: dbang bskur nas ni rim par spro //
translated: is conferred with empowerment and emanated in stages.

original: aom a'a:bam h'um/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: aom a'a:bam h'um/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis //
translated: oṃ āḥ vaṃ hūṃ

original: srog dang stsol ba rim pas bya //
analyzed: srog dang stsol ba rim pas bya //
translated: One should practice the life-force and the retention in stages.

original: mnyam par spros nas dbang bskur sbyin //
analyzed: mnyam par spros nas dbang bskur sbyin //
translated: Having emanated equally, one should bestow the empowerment.

original: ji ltar rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: ji ltar rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of the stages,

original: dogs pa med par bzlas bsgom bya //
analyzed: dogs pa med par bzlas bsgom bya //
translated: one should meditate on the recitation without hesitation.

original: ji ltar gsang sngags rjes mthun par //
analyzed: ji ltar gsang sngags rjes mthun par //
translated: As is concordant with the mantra,

original: dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa bya //🔽h'um brum/ aom hr'im kham bam/
analyzed: dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa bya // h'um brum/ aom hr'im kham bam/
translated: one who has the commitments should recite.🔽Hūṃ bhrūṃ.🔽Oṃ hrīṃ khaṃ vaṃ.

original: aom aa bam h'um/
analyzed: aom aa bam h'um/
translated: Oṃ a vaṃ hūṃ.

original: aom shr'i ma h'a su kham badzra satva d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i ma h'a su kham badzra satva d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī mahāsukhaṃ vajrasatva dākinī jālāṃbarāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i buddha d'a ka aa la la la aa:h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham bar h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i buddha d'a ka aa la la la aa:h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham bar h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī buddha dāka a la la la aḥ hūṃ dākinī jālāṃbarāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i ratna d'a ki tr'am aam aa d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam bam ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i ratna d'a ki tr'am aam aa d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam bam ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī ratna dāka traṃ aṃ dākinī jālāṃbaraṃ raṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i padma d'a ki hr'i hr'im  aa hum aa hum d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i padma d'a ki hr'i hr'im  aa hum aa hum d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī padma dāka hrīṃ hrīṃ a huṃ a huṃ dākinī jālāṃbarāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i badzra d'a ka aa:h'um phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom shr'i bi shva d'a ki ho kham a'a @227a *//🔽h'um d'a ki ni dz'a la sam ba ra h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom kham h'um phat/
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra d'a ka aa:h'um phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom shr'i bi shva d'a ki ho kham a'a @227a *// h'um d'a ki ni dz'a la sam ba ra h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom kham h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra ḍāka aḥ hūṃ phaṭ ḍākinī jālā śambaraṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ śrī viśva ḍāka ho khaṃ āḥ hūṃ ḍākinī jālā śambaraṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ khaṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽

analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur drug lhan cig tu //
